GE07bhg4c06u:1: anāśritaḥ karma-phalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:2: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c06u:4: citte śuddhe 'pi na dhyānaṃ vinā saṃnyāsa-mātrataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:5: muktiḥ syād iti ṣaṣṭhe 'smin dhyāna-yogo vitanvate ||
GE07bhg4c06u:7_0: tatra tāvat sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya [Gītā 5.13] ity ārabhya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikāyā
GE07bhg4c06u:7_1: jñāna-niṣṭhāyās tātparyenābhidhānād duḥkha-rūpatvāc ca karmaṇaḥ sahasā saṃnyāsātiprasaṅgaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:7_2: prāptaṃ vārayituṃ saṃnyāsād api śreṣṭhatvena karma-yogaṃ stauti anāśrita iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:8: karma-phalam anāśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ sann avaśya-kāryatayā vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:9: sa eva saṃnyāsī yogī ca na tu niragnir agni-sādhyeṣṭākhya-karma-tyāgī |
GE07bhg4c06u:12: yoga-sūtraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ pañcamānte yad īritam |
GE07bhg4c06u:14: tatra sarva-karma-tyāgena yogaṃ vidhāsyaṃs tyājyatvena hīnatvam āśaṅkya karma-yogaṃ stauti anāśrita iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:15_0: karmaṇāṃ phalam āśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ phalābhisaṃdhi-rahitaḥ san kāryaṃ kartavyatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:15_1: śāstreṇa vihitaṃ nityam agnihotrādi karma karoti yaḥ sa karmy api san saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti stūyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:18: tau cāsya vidyete phala-tyāgāt phala-tṛṣṇā-rūpa-citta-vikṣepābhāvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:19: karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-tyāga evātra gauṇyā vṛttyā saṃnyāsa-yoga-śabdābhyām abhidhīyate sakāmānapekṣya prāśastya-kathanāya |
GE07bhg4c06u:21: tasmād ayaṃ yadyapi na niragnir agni-sādhya-śrauta-karma-tyāgī na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c06u:24: athavā na niragnir na cākriyaḥ saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:25: kintu sāgniḥ sakriyaś ca niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāyī saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavya iti stūyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:26: apaśavo vā anye go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvān ity atreva praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā nañ-anvayopapattiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:27_0: atra cākriya ity anenaiva sarva-karma-saṃnyāsini labdhe niragnir iti vyarthaṃ syād
GE07bhg4c06u:27_1: ity agni-śabdena sarvāṇi karmāṇy upalakṣya niragnir iti saṃnyāsī kriyā-śabdena citta-vṛttīr
GE07bhg4c06u:27_2: upalakṣyākriya iti niruddha-citta-vṛttir yogī ca kathyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:28: tena na niragniḥ saṃnyāsī mantavyo na cākriyo yogī mantavya iti yathā-saṅkhyam ubhaya-vyatireko darśanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:29: evaṃ sati nañ-dvayam apy upapannam iti draṣṭavyam ||1||
GE07bhg4c06u:33: aṣṭāṅga-yogābhyāse pravṛttenāpi citta-śodhakaṃ niṣkāma-karma na tyājyam ity āha karma-phalam āśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ kāryam avaśya-kartavyatvena śāstra-vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:35: sa eva viṣaya-bhogeṣu cittābhāvād yogī cocyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:36: na ca niragnir agnihotrādi-karma-mātra-tyāgavān eva sannyāsy ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:37: na cākriyo na daihika-ceṣṭā-śūnyo 'rdha-nimīlita-netra eva yogī cocyate ||1||
GE07bhg4c06u:41: proktaṃ karma-yogam aṣṭāṅga-yoga-śiraskam upadekṣyann ādau tau tad-upāyatvāt taṃ karma-yogam stauti bhagavān anāśrita iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:42: karma-phalam paśv-anna-putra-svargādi-kāmanāśrito 'nicchan kāryam avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:46: na niragnir agnihotrādi-karma-tyāgī yati-veśaḥ sannyāsī na cākriyaḥ śarīra-karma-tyāgī ardha-mudrita-netro yogī |
GE07bhg4c06u:47: atra yogam aṣṭāṅgaṃ cikīrṣūṇāṃ sahasā karma na tyājyam iti matam ||1||
GE07bhg4c06u:50: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava |
GE07bhg4c06u:51: na hy asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:52: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ karma-yogasyaiva saṃnyāsatvaṃ pratipādayann āha yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:54: nyāsa evāty arecayat ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:55: kevalāt phala-saṃnyasanād dhetor yogam eva taṃ jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c06u:56: kuta ity apekṣāyām iti śabdokto hetur yoge 'py astīty āha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:57: na saṃnyastaḥ phala-saṃkalpo yena sa karma-niṣṭho jñāna-niṣṭho vā kaścid api na hi yogī bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:58: ataḥ phala-saṅkalpa-tyāga-sāmyāt saṃnyāsī ca phala-saṅkalpa-tyāgād eva citta-vikṣepābhāvād yogī ca bhavaty eva sa ity arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:60: asaṃnyāse 'pi saṃnyāsa-śabda-prayoge nimitta-bhūtaṃ guṇa-yogaṃ darśayitum āha yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:61: yaṃ sarva-karma-tat-phala-parityāgaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhuḥ śrutayaḥ nyāsa evāty arecayat,
GE07bhg4c06u:62: brāhmaṇāḥ puatraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣā-caryaṃ caranti ity ādyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:63: yogaṃ phala-tṛṣṇā-kartṛtvābhimānayoḥ parityāgena vihita-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ taṃ saṃnyāsaṃ viddhi he pāṇḍava |
GE07bhg4c06u:64: abrahma-dattaṃ brahma-dattam ity āha taṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe brahma-datta-sadṛśo 'yam iti nyāyāt para-śabdaḥ paratra prayujyamānaḥ sādṛśyaṃ bodhayati gauṇyā vṛttyā tad-bhāvāropeṇa vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:65: prakṛte tu kiṃ sādṛśyam ? iti tad āha nahīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:66: hi yasmād asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo 'tyakta-phala-saṅkalpaḥ kaścana kaścid api
GE07bhg4c06u:68: api tu sarvo yogī tyakta-phala-saṅkalpa eva bhavatīti phala-tyāga-sāmyāt tṛṣṇā-rūpa-vitta-vṛtti-nirodha-sāmyāc ca gauṇyā vṛttyā karmy eva saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:69: tathā hi - yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-nidrā-smṛtaya [YogaS 1.6] iti vṛttayaḥ pañca-vidhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:74: viparyayo mithyā-jñānam tasya pañca bhedā avidyāsmitā-rāga-dveṣābhiniveśaḥ [YogaS 2.3] ta eva ca kleśāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:77: abhāva-pratyayālambanā vṛttir nidrā [YogaS 1.10] na tu jñānādy-abhāva-mātram ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:78: anubhūta-viṣayāsaṃpramoṣaḥ smṛtiḥ [YogaS 1.11] pūrvānubhava-saṃskārajaṃ jñānam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:81: etādṛśāṃ sarvāsāṃ citta-vṛttīnāṃ norodho yoga iti ca samādhir iti ca kathyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:82: phala-saṅkalpas tu rāgākhyas tṛtīyo viparyaya-bhedas tan-nirodha-mātram api gauṇyā vṛttyā yoga iti saṃnyāsa iti cocyata iti na virodhaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:84: vastutas tathā viṣayebhyaś citta-naiścalyam eva yoga-śabdārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:85: tasmāt saṃnyāsa-yoga-śabdayor aikyārtham evāgatam ity āha yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:86: asaṃnyasto na saṃnyastas tyaktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ phalākāṅkṣā viṣaya-bhoga-spṛhā yena saḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:88: nanu sarvendriya-vṛtti-virati-rūpāyāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāyāṃ saṃnyāsa-śabdaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhe yoga-śabdaś ca paṭhyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:89: sa ca sarvendriya-vyāpārātmake karma-yoge sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti bruvatā bhavatā kayā vṛttyā nīyata iti cet tatrāha yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:90: yaṃ karma-yogam artha-tātparya-jñāḥ saṃnyāsṃ prāhus tam eva taṃ yogam aṣṭāṅgaṃ viddhi | he pāṇḍava !
GE07bhg4c06u:91: nanu siṃho mānavakaḥ ity ādau śauryādi-guṇa-sādṛśyena tathā prayogaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:92: prakṛteḥ kiṃ sādṛśyam iti cet tatrāha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:93: asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpaḥ kaścana kaścid jñāna-yogy aṣṭāṅga-yogī ca na bhavaty api tu saṃnyasta-saṃkalpa eva bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:94: saṃnyastaḥ parityaktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ phalecchā ca yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:95: tathā phala-tyāga-sādṛśyāt tṛṣṇā-rūpa-citta-vṛtti-nirodha-sādṛśyāc ca karma-yoginas tad-ubhayatvena prayogo gauṇa-vṛttyeti ||2||
GE07bhg4c06u:98: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:100: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yāvaj-jīvaṃ karma-yoga eva prāpta ity āśaṅkya tasyāvadhim āha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:101: jñāna-yogam āroḍhuṃ prātum icchoḥ puṃsas tad-ārohe kāraṇaṃ karmocyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:103: jñāna-yogam ārūḍhasya tu tasyaiva dhyāna-niṣṭhasya śamaḥ samādhiś citta-vikṣepaka-karmoparamo jñāna-paripāke kāraṇam ucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c06u:105: tat kiṃ praśastatvāt karma-yoga eva yāvaj-jīvam anuṣṭheya iti nety āha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:106_0: yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-rūpaṃ vairāgyam ārurukṣor āroḍhum icchor na tvārūḍhasya
GE07bhg4c06u:106_1: muner bhaviṣyataḥ karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-tyāginaḥ karma śāstra-vihitam agnihotrādi nityaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:106_2: bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ yogārohaṇe sādhanam anuṣṭheyam ucyate veda-mukhena mayā |
GE07bhg4c06u:107_0: yogārūḍhasya yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-rūpaṃ vairāgyaṃ prāptavatas tu tasyaiva pūrvaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:107_1: karmiṇo 'pi sataḥ śamaḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva kāraṇam anuṣṭheyatayā jñāna-paripāka-sādhanam ucyate ||3 ||
GE07bhg4c06u:109: nanu tarhy aṣṭāṅga-yogino yāvaj-jīvam eva niṣkāma-karma-yogaḥ prāpta ity āśaṅkya tasyāvadhim āha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:110: muner yogābhyāsino yogaṃ niścala-dhyāna-yogam āroḍhuṃ icchos tad-ārohe kāraṇaṃ karma cocyate citta-śuddhi-karatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:111: tatas tasya yogaṃ dhyāna-yogam ārūḍhasya dhyāna-niṣṭhā-prāptaḥ śamaḥ vikṣepaka-sarva-karmoparamaḥ kāraṇam |
GE07bhg4c06u:114: nanv evam aṣṭāṅga-yogino yāvaj jīvaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ prāptam iti cet tatrāha ārurukṣor iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:115: muner yogābhyāsino yogaṃ dhyāna-niṣṭhām ārurukṣos tad-ārohe karma kāraṇaṃ hṛd-viśuddhi-kṛttvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:116: tasyaiva yogārūḍhasya dhyāna-niṣṭhasya tad-dāḍhye śamo vikṣepaka-karmoparatiḥ kāraṇam ||3||
GE07bhg4c06u:119: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate |
GE07bhg4c06u:121: śrīdharaḥ : kīdṛśo 'yaṃ yogārūḍho yasya śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti ? atrāha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:122: indriyārtheṣv indriya-bhogyeṣu śabdādiśu tat-sādhaneṣu ca karmasu yadā nānuṣajjate āsaktiṃ na karoti |
GE07bhg4c06u:123: tatra hetuḥ āsakti-mūla-bhūtān sarvā bhoga-viṣayān karma-viṣayāṃś ca saṅkalpān saṃnyasituṃ tyaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:125: madhusūdanaḥ : kadā yogārūḍho bhavatīty ucyate yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:126_0: yadā yasmiṃś citta-samādhāna-kāla indriyārtheṣu śabdādiśu karmasu ca nitya-naimittika-kāmya-laukika-pratiṣiddheṣu
GE07bhg4c06u:126_2: ca prayojanābhāva-buddhyāham eteṣāṃ kartā mamaite bhogyā ity abhiniveśa-rūpam anuṣaṅgaṃ na karoti |
GE07bhg4c06u:127_0: hi yasmāt tasmāt sarva-saṅkalpa-saṃnyāsī sarveṣāṃ saṅkalpānām idaṃ mayā kartavyam
GE07bhg4c06u:127_1: etat phalaṃ bhoktavyam ity evaṃ rūpāṇāṃ mano-vṛtti-viśeṣāṇāṃ tad-viṣayāṇāṃ ca kāmānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:128: tadā śabdādiṣu karmasu cānuṣaṅgasya tad-dhetoś ca saṅkalpasya yogārohaṇa-pratibandhakasyābhāvād yogaṃ samādhim ārūḍho yogārūḍha ity ucyate
GE07bhg4c06u:130: viśvanāthaḥ : samyak-śuddha-cittas tu yogārūḍhas taj-jñāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:133: indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu tat-sādhaneṣu karmasu ca yadātmānanda-rasikaḥ san na sajjate |
GE07bhg4c06u:135: sarvān bhoga-viṣayān karma-viṣayāś ca saṅkalpānāsattimūla-bhūtān saṃnyasituṃ parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c06u:139: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:141: ato viṣayāsakti-tyāge mokṣaṃ tad-āsaktau ca bandhaṃ paryālocya rāgādi-svabhāvaṃ tyajed ity āha uddhared iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:143: na tv avasādayed adho na nayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:144: hi yata ātmaiva manaḥ-saṅgādy-uparata ātmanaḥ svasya bandhur upakārakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:147: yo yadaivaṃ yogārūḍho bhavati tadā tenātmanaivātmoddhṛto bhavati saṃsārānartha-vrātāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:149: ātmanā viveka-yuktena manasātmānaṃ svaṃ jīvaṃ saṃsāra-samudre nimagnaṃ tata uddharet |
GE07bhg4c06u:152: na tu viṣayāsaṅgenātmānam avasādayet saṃsāra-samudre majjayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:153: hi yasmād ātmaivātmano bandhur hitakārī saṃsāra-bandhanān mocana-hetur nānyaḥ kaścil laukikasya bandhor api snehānubandhena bandha-hetutvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:156: bāhyasyāpi ripor ātma-prayuktatvād yuktam avadhāraṇam ātmaivaa ripur ātmana iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:157: viśvanāthaḥ : yasmād indriyārthāsaktyaivātmā saṃsāra-kūpe patitas taṃ yatnenoddhared iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:159: viṣayāsakti-sahitena manasā tv ātmānaṃ nāvasādayet na saṃsāra-kūpe pātayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:160: tasmād ātmā mana eva bandhur mana eva ripuḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:162: viṣayādy-āsakta-manaskatayā saṃsāra-kūpe nimagnam ātmānaṃ jīvam ātmanā viṣayāsakti-rahitena manasā tasmād uddhared ūrdhvaṃ haret |
GE07bhg4c06u:163: viṣayāsaktena manasātmānaṃ nāvasādayet tatra na nimajjayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:164: hi niścaye naivam ātmaiva mana evātmanaḥ svasya bandhus tad eva ripuḥ | smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c06u:166: bandhāya viṣayāsaṅgo muktyai nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ || iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c06u:172: katham-bhūtasya cātmaiva ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:173: yenātmanaivātmā kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāta-rūpo jito vaśīkṛtasya tathābhūtasyātmana ātmaiva bandhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:174: anātmano 'jitātmanas tv ātmaivātmanaḥ śatrutve śatruvad apakāra-kāritve varteta ||6||
GE07bhg4c06u:176: idānīṃ kiṃ-lakṣaṇa ātmātmano bandhuḥ kiṃ-lakṣaṇo vātmano ripur ity ucyate bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:177: ātmā kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāto yena jitaḥ sva-vaśīkṛta ātmanaiva viveka-yuktena manasaiva na tu śastrādinā |
GE07bhg4c06u:178: tasyātmā svarūpam ātmano bandhur ucchṛṅkhala-sva-pravṛtty-abhāvena sva-hita-karaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:182: viśvanāthaḥ : kasya sa bandhuḥ ? kasya sa ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:183: yenātmanā jīvenātmā mano jitas tasya jīvasya sa ātmā mano bandhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:184: anātmano 'jita-manasas tv ātmaiva mana eva śatruvat śatrutve 'pakārakatve varteta ||6||
GE07bhg4c06u:185: baladevaḥ : kīdṛśasya sa bandhuḥ ? kīdṛśasya sa ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:186: yenātmanā jīvenātmā mana eva jitas tasya jīvasya sa ātmā mano bandhus tad-upakārī |
GE07bhg4c06u:187: anātmano 'jita-manasas tu jīvasyātmaiva mana eva śatruvat śatrutve 'pakārakatve varteta ||6||
GE07bhg4c06u:192: śrīdharaḥ : jitātmanaḥ svasmin bandhutvaṃ sphuṭayati jitātmana iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:193: jita ātmā yena tasya praśāntasya rāgādi-rahitasyaiva |
GE07bhg4c06u:194: paraṃ kevalam ātmā śītoṣṇādiṣu satsv api samāhitaḥ svātma-niṣṭho bhavati nānyasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:195: yad vā tasya hṛdi paramātmā samāhitaḥ sthito bhavati ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:196: madhusūdanaḥ : jitātmanaḥ sva-bandhutvaṃ vivṛṇoti jitātmana iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:197: śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkheṣu citta-vikṣepa-kareṣu satsv api tathā mānāpamānayoḥ pūjā-paribhavayoś citta-vikṣepa-hetvoḥ sator iti teṣu samatveneti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:198: jitātmanaḥ prāg-uktasya jitendriyasya praśāntasya sarvatra sama-buddhayā rāga-dveṣa-śūnyasya paramātmā sva-prakāśa-jñāna-svabhāva ātmā samāhitaḥ samādhi-viṣayo yogārūḍho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:200: jitātmanaḥ praśāntasyaiva paraṃ kevalam ātmā samāhito bhavati nānyasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:201: tasmāj jitātmā praśāntaś ca bhaved ity arthaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:202: viśvanāthaḥ : atha yogārūḍhasya cihnāni darśayati tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:203: jitātmano jita-manasaḥ praśāntasya rāgādi-rahitasya yoginaḥ param atiśayena samāhitaḥ samādhi-stha ātmā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c06u:204: śītādiṣu satsv api mānāpamānayoḥ prāptayor api ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:205: baladevaḥ : yogārambha-yogyām avasthām āha jiteti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:206: śītoṣṇādiṣu mānāpamānayoś ca jitātmano 'vikṛta-manasaḥ praśāntasya rāgādi-śūnyasyātmā param atyarthaṃ samāhitaḥ samādhistho bhavati ||7||
GE07bhg4c06u:211: śrīdharaḥ : yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ coktam upapādya upasaṃharati jñāneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:212: jñānam aupadeśikaṃ vijñānam aparokṣānubhavaḥ tābhyāṃ tṛpto nirākāṅkṣa ātmā cittaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:219_0: jñānaṃ śāstroktānāṃ padārthānām aupadeśikaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānaṃ tad-aprāmāṇya-śaṅkā-nirākaraṇa-phalena
GE07bhg4c06u:219_1: vicāreṇa tathaiva teṣāṃ svānubhavenāparokṣīkaraṇaṃ tābhyāḥ tṛptaḥ saṃjātālaṃ-pratyaya
GE07bhg4c06u:221: ataeva vijitāni rāga-dveṣa-pūrvakād viṣaya-grahaṇādvayāvartitānīndriyāṇi yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:222: ataeva heyopādeya-buddhi-śūnyatvena samāni mṛt-piṇḍa-pāṣāṇa-kāñcanāni yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:223: yogī paramahaṃsa-parivrājakaḥ para-vairāgya-yukto yogārūḍha ity ucyate ||8||
GE07bhg4c06u:225: jñānam aupadeśikaṃ vijñānam aparokṣānubhavas tābhyāṃ tṛpto nirākāṅkṣa ātmā cittaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:226: kūṭastha ekenaiva svabhāvena sarva-kālaṃ vyāpya sthitaḥ sarva-vastuṣv anāsaktatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:230: jñānam śāstrajaṃ vijñānam viviktātmānubhavas tābhyāṃ tṛptātmā pūrṇa-manāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:235: īdṛśo yogī niṣkāma-karmī yukta ātma-darśana-rūpa-yogābhyāsa-yogya ucyate ||8||
GE07bhg4c06u:239: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu sama-buddhir viśiṣyate ||9||
GE07bhg4c06u:240: śrīdharaḥ : suhṛn-mitrādiṣu sama-buddhi-yuktas tu tato 'pi śreṣṭha ity āha suhṛd iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:250: eteṣu samā rāga-dveṣādi-śūnyā buddhir yasya sa tu viśiṣṭaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c06u:251: madhusūdanaḥ : suhṛn-mitrādiṣu sama-buddhis tu sarva-yogi-śreṣṭha ity āha suhṛd iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:252: suhṛt pratyupakāram anapekṣya pūrva-snehaṃ sambandhaṃ ca vinaivopakartā |
GE07bhg4c06u:259: eteṣu sādhuṣu śāstra-vihita-kāriṣu pāpeṣu śāstra-pratiṣiddha-kāriṣv api |
GE07bhg4c06u:260: ca-kārād anyeṣu ca sarveṣu sama-buddhiḥ kaḥ kīdṛk-karmety avyāpṛta-buddhiḥ sarvatra rāga-dveṣa-śūnyao viśiṣyate sarvatra utkṛṣṭo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:275: sa sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanād api yoginaḥ sakāśād viśiṣyate śreṣṭho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:287: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:290: evaṃ yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇam uktvedānīṃ tasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādinā sa yogī paramo mata ity antena granthena yogīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:297: yataṃ saṃyataṃ cittam ātmā dehaś ca yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:301: evaṃ yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ coktvā tasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādibhiḥ sa yogī paramo mata ity antais trayoviṃśatyā ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:303: yogī yogārūḍha ātmānaṃ cittaṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ yuñjīta kṣiptam ūḍha-vikṣipta-bhūmi-parityāgenaikāgra-nirodha-bhūmibhyāṃ samāhitaṃ kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:304: rahasi giri-guhādau yoga-pratibandhaka-durjanādi-varjite deśe sthita ekākī tyakta-sarva-gṛha-parijanaḥ saṃnyāsī |
GE07bhg4c06u:305: cittam antaḥ-karaṇam ātmā dehaś ca saṃyatau yoga-pratibandhaka-vyāpāra-śūnyau yasya sa yata-cittātmā |
GE07bhg4c06u:307: ataeva cāparigrahaḥ śāstrābhyanujñātenāpi yoga-pratibandhakena parigraheṇa śūnyaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c06u:308: viśvanāthaḥ : atha sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādinā sa yogī paramo mata ity atas tena |
GE07bhg4c06u:309: yogī yogārūḍha ātmānaṃ mano yuñjīta samādhi-yuktaṃ kuryāt ||10||
GE07bhg4c06u:310: baladevaḥ : atha tasya sāṅgaṃ yogam upadiśati yogīty ādi trayoviṃśatyā |
GE07bhg4c06u:312: ātmānaṃ manaḥ satatam aharahar yuñjīta samādhi-yuktaṃ kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:314: tatrāpy ekākī dvitīya-śūnyas tatrāpi yata-cittātmā yatau yoga-pratikūla-vyāpāra-varjitau citta-dehau yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:319: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:323: śrīdharaḥ : āsana-niyamaṃ darśayann āha śucāv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:324: śuddhe sthāne ātmanaḥ svasya āsanaṃ sthāpayitvā |
GE07bhg4c06u:331: kuśānām upari carma tad upari vastram āstīryetety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c06u:333: tatra tasminn āsana upaviśyaikāgraṃ vikṣepa-rahitaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yogaṃ yuñjyād abhyaset |
GE07bhg4c06u:334: yatāḥ saṃyatāś cittasyendriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:336: madhusūdanaḥ : tatrāsana-niyamaṃ darśayann āha śucau deśa iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:337_0: śucau svabhāvataḥ saṃskārato vā śuddhe jana-samudāya-rahite nirbhaye gaṅgā-taṭa-guhādau
GE07bhg4c06u:337_1: deśe sthāne pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram niścalam nātyucchritaṃ nātyuccaṃ nāpy atinīcam cailājina-kuśottaraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:337_2: cailaṃ mṛdu-vastram ajinaṃ mṛdu-vyāghrādi-carma te kuśebhya uttare uparitane yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c06u:338: āsyate 'sminn ity āsanaṃ kuśamaya-vṛṣy-upari mṛdu-carma tad-upari mṛdu-vastra-rūpam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:339: tathā cāha bhagavān patañjaliḥ sthira-sukham āsanam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:340: ātmana iti parāsana-vyāvṛtty-arthaṃ tasyāpi parecchā-niyamābhāvena yoga-vikṣepa-paratvāt ||11||
GE07bhg4c06u:341: evam āsanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kim kuryād iti tatrāha tatraikāgram iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:342: tatra tasminn āsana upaviśyaiva na tu śayānas tiṣṭhan vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:344: yatāḥ saṃyatā uparatāś cittasyendriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā vṛttayo yena sa yata-cittendriya-kriyaḥ san yogaṃ samādhiṃ yuñjītābhyaset |
GE07bhg4c06u:347: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:348_0: kiṃ kṛtvā yogam abhyased iti tatrāha ekāgraṃ rājasatāmasa-vyutthānākhya-prāg-ukta-bhūmi-traya-parityāgenaika-viṣayaka-dhārāvāhikāneka-vṛtti-yuktam
GE07bhg4c06u:348_1: udrikta-sattvaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā dṛḍha-bhūmikena prayatnena sampādyaikāgratā-vivṛddhy-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:349: sa ca brahmākāra-mano-vṛtti-pravāha eva nididhyāsanākhyaḥ | tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c06u:352: etad evābhipretya dhyānābhyāsa-prakarṣaṃ vidadhe bhagavān - yogī yuñjīta satataṃ [Gītā 6.10] yuñjyād yogam ātma-viśuddhaye [Gītā 6.12] |
GE07bhg4c06u:357: ātmano 'ntaḥ-karaṇasya viśuddhatve vikṣepa-śūnyatvenātisūkṣmatayā brahma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatāyai dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śruteḥ ||11-12||
GE07bhg4c06u:358: baladevaḥ : āsanam āha śucāv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:359: śucau svataḥ saṃskārataś ca śuddhe gaṅgā-taṭa-giri-guhādau deśe sthiraṃ niścalam |
GE07bhg4c06u:366: ātmana iti parāsanasya vyāvṛttaye parecchāyau aniyatatvena tasya yoga-pratikūlatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:367: tatreti tasmin pratiṣṭhāpite āsane upaviśya, na tu tiṣṭhan śayāno vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:368: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ -- āsīnaḥ sambhavāt [Vs 4.1.7] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:369: yatā niruddhāś cittādi-kriyā yasya saḥ mana ekāgram avyākulaṃ kṛtvā yogaṃ yuñjīta samādhim abhyaset |
GE07bhg4c06u:370: ātmano 'ntaḥkaraṇasya viśuddhaye atinairmalyena saukṣmyeṇātma-darśana-yogyatāyai dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā
GE07bhg4c06u:377: manaḥ saṃyamya mac-citto yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c06u:378: śrīdharaḥ : cittaikāgryāpayoginīṃ dehādhikāriṇāṃ darśayann āha samam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:380: kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:385: svīyaṃ nāsikāgraṃ samprekṣya ity ardha-nimīlita-netra ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:386: itas tato diśaś cānavalokayan āsīta ity uttareṇānvayaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c06u:393: aham eva paraṃ puruṣārtho yasya sa mat-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:396: tad-arthaṃ bāhyam āsanam uktvādhunā tatra kathaṃ śarīra-dhāraṇam ity ucyate samam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:397_0: kāyaḥ śarīra-madhyaṃ sa ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvaṃ mūlādhārād ārabhya
GE07bhg4c06u:397_1: mūrdhānta-paryantaṃ samam avakram acalam akampaṃ dhārayann eka-tattvābhyāsena vikṣepa-saha-bhāvya-aṅgam
GE07bhg4c06u:398: kiṃ ca svaṃ svīyaṃ nāsikāgraṃ saṃprekṣyaiva laya-vikṣepa-rāhityāya viṣaya-pravṛtti-rahito 'nimīlita-netra ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:399: diśaś cānavalokayann antarāntarā diśāṃ cāvalokanam akurvan yoga-pratibandhakatvāt tasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:402: nidāna-nivṛtti-rūpeṇa prakarṣeṇa śānto rāgādi-doṣa-rahita ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya sa praśāntātmā śāstrīya-niścaya-dārḍhyād vigatā bhīḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:406: mayi parameśvare pratyak-citi sa-guṇe nirguṇe vā cittaṃ yasya sa mac-citto mad-viṣayaka-dhārāvāhika-citta-vṛttimān |
GE07bhg4c06u:407: putrādau priye cintanīye sati katham evaṃ syād ata āha mat-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:408: aham eva paramānanda-rūpatvāt paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ priyo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:409: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā [BAU 1.4.8] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:412: na tu svecchayā vyuttiṣṭhed ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:413: bhavati kaścid rāgī strī-citto na tu striyam eva paratvenārādhyatvena gṛhṇāti |
GE07bhg4c06u:414: kiṃ tarhi ? rājānaṃ vā devaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:415: ayaṃ tu mac-citto mat-paraś ca sarvārādhyatvena mām eva manyata iti bhāṣya-kṛtāṃ vyākhyā |
GE07bhg4c06u:419: kāyo deha-madhya-bhāgaḥ samam avakram acalaṃ niścalaṃ dhārayan kurvan manaḥ saṃyamya pratyāhṛtya mac-citto māṃ caturbhujaṃ sundarākāraṃ cintayan |
GE07bhg4c06u:421: baladevaḥ : āsane tasminn upaviṣṭasya śarīra-dhāraṇa-vidhim āha samam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:423: kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca teṣāṃ samāhāraḥ prāṇy-aṅgatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:426: sthiro dṛḍha-prayatno bhūtvā sva-nāsikāgraṃ samprekṣya sampaśyan mano-laya-vikṣepa-nivṛttaye bhrū-madhya-dṛṣṭiḥ sann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:440: śrīdharaḥ : yogābhyāsa-phalam āha yuñjann evam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:441: evam ukta-prakāreṇa sadātmānaṃ mano yuñjan samāhitaṃ kurvan |
GE07bhg4c06u:442: niyataṃ niruddhaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:444: kathambhūtam ? nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ prāpyaṃ yasyāṃ tām |
GE07bhg4c06u:446: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ saṃprajñāta-samādhināsīnasya kiṃ syād ity ucyate yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:447_1: samāhitaṃ kurvan yogī sadā yogābhyāsa-paro 'bhāysātiśayena niyataṃ niruddhaṃ mānasaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:447_2: mano yena niyatā niruddhā mānasā mano-vṛtti-rūpā vikārā yeneti vā niyata-mānasaḥ san,
GE07bhg4c06u:449: na tu sāṃsārikāṇy aiśvaryāṇi anātma-viṣaya-samādhi-phalāny adhigacchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:451: tathā ca tat-tat-samādhi-phalāny uktvāha bhagavān patañjaliḥ -- te samādhāv upasargā vyutthāne siddhayaḥ [YogaS 3.37] iti,
GE07bhg4c06u:452: sthāny-upanimantraṇe saṅga-smayākaraṇaṃ punaḥ aniṣṭa-prasaṅgāt [YogaS 3.51] iti ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:454_0: tathā coddālako devair āmantrito 'pi tatra saṅgam ādaraṃ smayaṃ garvaṃ cākṛtvā devān
GE07bhg4c06u:454_1: avajñāya punar aniṣṭa-prasaṅga-nivāraṇāya nirvikalpakam eva samādhim akarod iti vasiṣṭhenopākhyāyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:455: mumukṣubhir heyaś ca samādhiḥ sūtritaḥ patañjalinā -- vitarka-vicārānandāsmitā-rūpānugamāt saṃprajñātaḥ [YogaS 1.17] |
GE07bhg4c06u:456: samyak saṃśaya-viparyayānadhyavasāya-rahitatvena prajñāyate prakarṣeṇa viśeṣa-rūpeṇa jñāyate bhāvyasya rūpaṃ yena sa samprajñātaḥ samādhir bhāvanā-viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:457: bhāvanā hi bhāvyasya viṣayāntara-parihāreṇa cetasi punaḥ punar niveśanam |
GE07bhg4c06u:460: tad uktaṃ -- kṣīṇa-vṛtter abhijātasyeva maṇer grahītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣu tat-stha-tad-añjanatā-samāpattiḥ [YogaS 1.41] |
GE07bhg4c06u:461: kṣīṇā rājasa-tāmasa-vṛttayo yasya tasya cittasya grahītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣv ātmendriya-viṣayeṣu tat-sthatā tatraivaikāgratā |
GE07bhg4c06u:465_1: evaṃ nirmalasya cittasya tat-tad-bhāvanīya-vastūparāgāt tat-tad-rūpāpattiḥ samāpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:466: yadyapi garhītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣv ity uktaṃ tathāpi bhūmikā-krama-vaśād grāhya-grahaṇa-grahītṛṣv iti boddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:467: yataḥ prathamaṃ grāhya-niṣṭha eva samādhir bhavati tato grahaṇa-niṣṭhas tato grahītṛ-niṣṭha iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:469: tatra yadā sthūlaṃ mahā-bhūtendriyātmaka-ṣoḍaśa-vikāra-rūpaṃ viṣayam ādāya pūrvāparānusandhānena śabdārthollekhena ca bhāvanā kriyate tadā sa-vitarkaḥ samādhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:470: asminn evālambate pūrvāparānusandhāna-śabdārthollekha-śūnyatvena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā nirvitarkaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:473: deśa-kāla-dharmāvacchedena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā sa-vicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:474: asminn evālambane deśa-kāla-dharmāvacchedaṃ vinā dharmi-mātrāvabhāsitvena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā nirvicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:476: tathā ca bhāṣyaṃ vitarkaś cittasya sthūla ālambana ābhogaḥ sūkṣme vicāra iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:479: bhāvyate tadā guṇa-bhāvāc cic-chakteḥ sukha-prakāśamayasya sattvasya bhāvayamānasyodrekātmānanadaḥ samādhir bhavati |

GE07bhg4c06u:482_0: tataḥ paraṃ rajas-tamo-leśānabhibhūtaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam ālambanīkṛtya yā bhāvanā pravartate

GE07bhg4c06u:646: mat-saṃsthāṃ mad-adhīnāṃ nirvāṇa-paramāṃ śāntim adhigacchati labhate |

GE07bhg4c06u:648: nirvāṇa-paramāṃ mokṣāvadhikām iti siddhayo 'pi yoga-phalānīty uktam ||15||
GE07bhg4c06u:651: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:653: śrīdharaḥ : yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasyāhārādi-niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:654: atyantam adhikaṃ bhuñjānasya ekāntam atyantam abhuñjānasyāpi yogaḥ samādhir na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:656: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasyāhārādi-niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:657: yad bhuktaṃ sajjīryati śarīrasya ca kārya-kṣamatāṃ sampādayati tad-ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad atikramya lobhenādhikam aśnato na yogo 'sti ajīrṇa-doṣeṇa vyādhi-pīḍitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:659: anāhārād atyalpāhārād vā rasa-poṣaṇābhāvena śarīrasya kāryākṣamatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:660: yad u ha vā ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad avati tan na hinasti yad bhūyo hinasti tad yat kanīyo 'nnaṃ na tad avati [ŚatapathaB 9.2.1.2] iti śatapatha-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:661: tasmād yogī nātma-saṃmitād annād adhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vāśnīyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:665: ity ādi yoga-śāstrokta-parimāṇād adhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vāśnato yogo na sampadyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:666: tathātinidrā-śīlasyātijāgrataś ca yogo naivāsti he 'rjuna sāvadhāo bhavety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:668: nādhmātaḥ kṣudhitaḥ śrānto na ca vyākula-cetanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:669: yuñjīta yogaṃ rājendra yogī siddhy-artham ātmanaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:670: nātīśīte na caivoṣṇe na dvandve nānilānvite |
GE07bhg4c06u:671: kāleṣv eteṣu yuñjīta na yogaṃ dhyāna-tat-paraḥ || ity ādi ||16||
GE07bhg4c06u:672: viśvanāthaḥ : yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasya niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:675: vāyoḥ saṅcaraṇārthaṃ tu caturtham avaśeṣayet || iti ||16||
GE07bhg4c06u:676: baladevaḥ : yogam abhyasyato bhojanādi-niyamam āha nātīti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c06u:677: atyaśanam anatyaśanaṃ ca, atisvāpo 'tijāgaraś ca, yoga-virodhy-ativihārādi cottarāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c06u:682: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kathambhūtasya yogo bhavatīti ? ata āha - yuktāhāreti |
GE07bhg4c06u:683: yukto niyata āhāro vihāraś ca gatir yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:684: karmasu kāryeṣu yuktā niyatā ceṣṭā yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:688: evam āhārādi-niyama-virahiṇo yoga-vyatirekam uktvā tan-niyamavato yogānvayam āha yuktāhāra iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:692: tathānyeṣv api praṇava-japopaniṣad-āvartanādiṣu karmasu yuktā niyata-kālā ceṣṭā yasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:693: tathā svapno nidrā avabodho jāgaraṇaṃ tau yuktau niyata-kālau yasya tasya yogo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:695: evaṃ prayanta-viśeṣeṇa sampādito yogaḥ kiṃ-phala iti tatrāha duḥkhaheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:698: ardham aśanasya sa-vyañjanasya tṛtīyam udakasya tu |
GE07bhg4c06u:701: vihārasya niyatatvaṃ yoganān na paraṃ gacched ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:703: rātrer vibhāga-trayaṃ kṛtvā prathamānyayor jāgaraṇaṃ madhye svapanam iti svapnāvabodhayor niyata-kālatvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:706: yukto niyata evāhāro bhojanaṃ vihāro gamanaṃ ca yasya tasya karmasu vyavahārika-pāramārthika-kṛtyeṣu yuktā niyatā eva ceṣṭā vāg-vyāpārādyā yasya tasya ||17||
GE07bhg4c06u:708: mitāhāra-vihārasya karmasu laukika-pāramārthika-kṛtyeṣu mita-vāgādi-vyāpārasya mita-svāpa-jāgarasya ca sarva-duḥkha-nāśako yogo bhavati tasmād yogī tathā tathā vartate ||17||
GE07bhg4c06u:712: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva-kāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā ||18||
GE07bhg4c06u:713: śrīdharaḥ : kadā niṣpanna-yogaḥ puruṣo bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:714: viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niruddhaṃ sac-cittam ātmany eva yadā niścalaṃ tiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c06u:715: kiṃ ca sarva-kāmebhya aihikāmuṣmika-bhogebhyo niḥspṛho vigata-tṛṣṇo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:718: evam ekāgra-bhūmau samprajñātaṃ samādhim abhidhāya nirodha-bhūmāv asamprajñātaṃ samādhiṃ vaktum upakramate yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:719_0: yadā yasmin kāle para-vairāgya-vaśād viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niyataṃ sarva-vṛtti-śūnyatām
GE07bhg4c06u:719_1: āpāditaṃ cittaṃ vigata-rajas-tamaskam antaḥkaraṇa-sattvaṃ svacchatvāt sarva-viṣayākāra-grahaṇa-samartham
GE07bhg4c06u:719_2: api sarvato-niruddha-vṛttikatvād ātmany eva pratyak citi anātmānuparakte vṛtti-rāhitye
GE07bhg4c06u:719_3: 'pi svataḥ-siddhasyātmākārasya vārayitum aśakyatvāc citer eva prādhānyān nyag-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:720: tadā tasmin sarva-vṛtti-nirodha-kāle yuktaḥ samāhita ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:722: nirgatā doṣa-darśanena sarvebhyo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣayebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā yasyeti paraṃ vairāgyam asamprajñāta-samādher
GE07bhg4c06u:723: antaraṅgaṃ sādhanam uktam | tathā ca vyākhyātaṃ prāk ||18||
GE07bhg4c06u:724: viśvanāthaḥ :yogī niṣpanna-yogaḥ kadā bhaved ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:725: viniyataṃ niruddhaṃ cittam ātmani svasminn evāvatiṣṭhate niścalī-bhavatīty arthaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c06u:726: baladevaḥ : yogī niṣpanna-yogaḥ kadā syād ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:727: yogam abhyasyato yoginaś cittam yadā viniyataṃ niruddhaṃ sadātmany eva svasminn evāvasthitaṃ sthiraṃ bhavati,
GE07bhg4c06u:731: yathā dīpo nivāta-stho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā |
GE07bhg4c06u:732: yogino yata- cittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c06u:734: vāta-śūnye deśe sthito dīpo yathā neṅgate na vicalati |
GE07bhg4c06u:737: yataṃ niyataṃ cittaṃ yasya tasya niṣkampatayā prakāśakatayā cācañcalaṃ tac cittaṃ tadvat tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c06u:738: madhusūdanaḥ : samādhau nivṛttikasya cittasyopamānam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:739: dīpa-calana-hetunā vātena rahite deśe sthito dīpo yathā calana-hetv-abhāvān neṅgate na calati,
GE07bhg4c06u:740: sopamā smṛtā sa dṛṣṭāntaś cintito yogajñaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:742_1: asamprajñāta-samādhi-rūpaṃ yogaṃ nirodha-bhūmau yuñjato 'nutiṣṭhato ya ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:742_2: tasya niścalatayā sattvodrekeṇa prakāśakatayā ca niścalo dīpo dṛṣṭānta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:743: ātmano yogaṃ yuñjata iti vyākhyāne dārṣṭāntikālābhaḥ sarvāvasthasyāpi cittasya sarvadātmākāratayātma-pada-vaiyarthyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:745: kintu svata evātmākārasya sato 'nātmākāratā nivartyata iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:747: yata-cittasyeti bhāva-paro nirdeśaḥ karma-dhārayo vā yatasya cittasyety arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c06u:749: nivāta-stho nirvāta-deśa-sthito dīpo neṅgate na calati yaḥ sa eva dīpa upamā yathā yathāvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:750: so 'ci lope cet pāda-pūraṇam [Pāṇ 6.1.134] iti sandhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:751: kasyopamā ity ata āha yogina iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:752: baladevaḥ : tadā yogī kīdṛśo bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c06u:753: nirvāta-deśa-stho dīpo neṅgate na calati niścalaḥ sa-prabhas tiṣṭhati sa dīpo yathā yathāvad upamā yogajñaiḥ smṛtā cintitā |
GE07bhg4c06u:754: sopamety atra so 'ci lope cet pāda-pūraṇam [Pāṇ 6.1.134] iti sūtrāt sandhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:757: yata-cittasya niruddha-sarva-citta-vṛtter ātmano yogaṃ dhyānaṃ yuñjato 'nutiṣṭhataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:763: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhi-grāhyam atīndriyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:764: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c06u:765: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:766: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate ||22||
GE07bhg4c06u:770: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava [Gītā 6.2] ity ādau karmaiva yoga-śabdenoktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:771: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti [Gītā 6.16] ity ādau tu samādhir yoga-śabdenoktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:772: tatra mukhyo yogaḥ ka ity apekṣāyāṃ samādhim eva svarūpataḥ phalataś ca lakṣayan sa eva mukhyo yoga ity āha yatreti sārdhais tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:773: yatra yasmin avasthā-viśeṣe yogābhyāsena niruddhaṃ cittam uparataṃ bhavatīti yogasya svarūpa-lakṣaṇam uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:774: tathā ca pātañjalaṃ sūtram yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:777: ātmanā śuddhena manasā ātmānam eva paśyati na tu dehādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:780: yatrety ādīnāṃ yac-chandānāṃ taṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyād iti caturthena ślokenānvayaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:782: ātmany eva toṣe hetum āha sukham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:783: yatra yasminn avasthā-viśeṣe yat tat kim api niratiśayam ātyantikaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c06u:784: nanu tadā viṣayendriya-sambandhābhāvāt kutaḥ sukhaṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c06u:787: ataeva ca yatra sthitaḥ saṃs tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati ||21||
GE07bhg4c06u:789: yam ātma-sukha-rūpaṃ lābhaṃ labdhvā tato 'dhikam aparaṃ lābhaṃ na manyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:791: yasmiṃś ca sthito mahatāpi śītoṣṇādi-duḥkhena na vicālyate nābhibhūyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:794: ya evaṃ-bhūto 'vasthā-viśeṣas taṃ duḥkha-saṃyoga-viyogaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:795: duḥkha-śabdena duḥkha-miśritaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ sukham api gṛhyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:796: duḥkhasya saṃyogena saṃsparśa-mātreṇāpi viyogo yasmin tam avasthā-viśeṣaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ yoga-śabda-vācyaṃ jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:798: yad vā duḥkha-saṃyogena viyoga eva śūre kātara-śabda-vad viruddha-lakṣaṇayā yoga ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:799: karmaṇi tu yoga-śabdas tad-upāyatvād aupacārika eveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:800: yasmād evaṃ mahā-phalo yogas tasmāt sa eva yatnato 'bhyasanīya ity āha tam iti sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c06u:801: sa yogo niścayena śāstrācāryopadeśa-janitena nirveda-rahitena cetasā yoktavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:804: evaṃ sāmānyena samādhim uktvā nirodha-samādhiṃ vistareṇa vivarītum ārambhate yatreti |
GE07bhg4c06u:805_0: yatra yasmin pariṇāma-viśeṣe yoga-sevayā yogābhyāsa-pāṭavena jāte sati niruddham
GE07bhg4c06u:805_1: eka-viṣayaka-vṛtti-pravāha-rūpām ekāgratāṃ tyaktvā nirindhanāgnivad upaśāmyan nirvṛttikatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:806_0: yatra ca yasmiṃś ca pariṇāme sati ātmanā rajas-tamo 'nabhibhūta-śuddha-sattva-mātreṇāntaḥ-karaṇenātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:806_1: pratyak-caitanyaṃ paramātmābhinnaṃ sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam anantam advitīyaṃ paśyan
GE07bhg4c06u:806_2: vedānta-pramāṇajayā vṛttyā sākṣātkurvann ātmany eva paramānanda-ghane tuṣyati,
GE07bhg4c06u:809: paramātma-darśane saty atuṣṭi-hetv-abhāvāt tuṣyaty eveti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:811: yogaṃ vidyād iti pareṇānvayaḥ | yatra kāla iti tu vyākhyānam asādhu tac-chabdānanvayāt ||20||
GE07bhg4c06u:812: ātmany eva toṣe hetum āha sukham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:813_0: yatra yasminn avasthā-viśeṣa ātyantikam anantaṃ niratiśayaṃ brahma-svarūpam atīndriyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:813_2: sattva-mātra-vāhinyā grāhyaṃ sukhaṃ yogī vetti anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:814: yatra ca sthito 'yaṃ vidvāṃs tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati |
GE07bhg4c06u:815: taṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyād iti pareṇānvayaḥ samānaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:819: buddhi-grāhyam iti sauṣupta-sukha-vyāvṛttiḥ suṣuptau buddher līnatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:821: tad uktaṃ gauḍa-pādaiḥ - līyate tu suṣuptau tan nigṛhītaṃ na līyate iti | tathā ca śrūyate -
GE07bhg4c06u:827: vṛttyā tu sukhāsvādanaṃ gauḍācāryais tatra pratiṣiddham - nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaṃ prajñayā bhavet iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:828: mahad idaṃ samādhau sukham anubhavāmīti sa-vikalpa-vṛtti-rūpā prajñā sukhāsvādaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:829: taṃ vyutthāna-rūpatvena samādhi-virodhitvād yogī na kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:830: ataevaitādṛśyā prajñayā saha saṅgaṃ parityajet tāṃ nirundhyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:831: nirvṛttikena tu cittena svarūpa-sukhānubhavas taiḥ pratipāditaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:832: svasthaṃ śāntaṃ sa-nirvāṇa-kathyaṃ sukham uttamam iti spaṣṭaṃ caitad upariṣṭhāt kariṣyate ||21||
GE07bhg4c06u:833: yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvata ity uktam upapādayati yaṃ labdhveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:834: yaṃ ca niratiśayātmaka-sukha-vyañjakaṃ nirvṛttika-cittāvasthā-viśeṣaṃ labdhvā santatābhyāsa-paripākena sampādyāparaṃ lābhaṃ tato 'dhikaṃ na manyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:835: kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptaṃ prāpaṇīyam ity ātma-lābhāc ca paraṃ vidyate iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:836_0: evaṃ viṣaya-bhoga-vāsanayā samādher vicalanaṃ nāstīty uktvā śīta-vāta-maśakādy-upadrava-nivāraṇārtham
GE07bhg4c06u:836_1: api tan nāstīty āha yasmin paramātma-sukha-maye nirvṛttika-cittāvasthā-viśeṣe sthito
GE07bhg4c06u:836_2: yogī guruṇā mahatā śastra-nipātādi-nimittena mahatāpi duḥkhena na vicālyate kim uta
GE07bhg4c06u:837_0: yatroparamata ity ārabhya bahubhir viśeṣaṇair yo nivṛttikaḥ paramānandābhivyañjakaś
GE07bhg4c06u:837_2: duḥkha-viyogam eva santaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ viyoga-śabdārtham api virodhi-lakṣaṇayā
GE07bhg4c06u:837_3: yoga-śabda-vācyaṃ vidyāj jānīyāc ca tu yoga-śabdānurodhāt kaṃcit sambandhaṃ pratipadyetety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:838: tathā ca bhagavān patañjalir asūtrayat yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:839: yogo bhavati duḥkhahā [6.17] iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad etad upasaṃhṛtam |
GE07bhg4c06u:840: evaṃ-bhūte yoge niścayānirvedayoḥ sādhanatva-vidhānāyāha sa niścayeneti | sa
GE07bhg4c06u:841: yathokta-phalo yogo niścayena śāstrācārya-vacana-tātparya-viṣayo 'rthaḥ satya evety adhvayasāyena yoktavyo 'bhyasanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:842: anirviṇṇa-cetasā etāvatāpi kālena yogo na siddhaḥ kim ataḥ paraṃ kaṣṭam ity anutāpo nirvedas tad-rahitena cetasā |
GE07bhg4c06u:843: iha janmani janmāntare vā setsyati kiṃ tvarayety evaṃ dhairyam uktena manasety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:846: manaso nigrahas tadvad bhaved aparikhedataḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:847: utseka utsecanaṃ śoṣaṇādhvasyāyena jaloddharaṇam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:849: kasyacit kila pakṣiṇo 'ṇḍāni tīra-sthāni taraṅga-vegena sumudro 'pajahāra |
GE07bhg4c06u:850: sa ca samudraṃ śoṣayiṣāmy eveti pravṛttaḥ sva-mukhāgreṇaikaikaṃ jala-bindum upari pracikṣepa |
GE07bhg4c06u:851: tadā ca bahubhiḥ pakṣibhir bandhu-vargair vāryamāṇo 'pi naivopararāma |
GE07bhg4c06u:852: yadṛcchayā ca tatrāgatena nāradena nivārito 'py asmin janmani janmāntare vā yena kenāpy upāyena samudraṃ śoṣayiṣyāmy eveti pratijajñe |
GE07bhg4c06u:853: tataś ca daivānukūlyāt kṛpālur nārado garuḍaṃ tat-sāhāyyāya preṣayāmāsa |
GE07bhg4c06u:854: samudras tvaj-jñāti-droheṇa tvām avamanyata iti vacanena |

GE07bhg4c06u:857: īśvaro 'nugṛhṇāti | tataś ca pakṣiṇa iva tasyābhimataṃ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ ||23||

GE07bhg4c06u:896: na tu dehādi paśyan viṣayeṣv iti citta-vṛtti-nirodhena svarūpeṇeṣṭa-prāpti-lakṣaṇena phalena ca yogo darśitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:898: yatra samādhau yat tat prasiddham ātyantikaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vetty anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:900: ataeva yatra sthitas tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati,
GE07bhg4c06u:901: yaṃ yogaṃ labdhvaiva tato 'paraṃ lābham adhikaṃ na manyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:902: guruṇā guṇavat putra-vicchedādinā na vicāyate tam iti |

GE07bhg4c06u:916_1: cakṣur-ādi-karaṇa-samūhaṃ viniyamya samantataḥ sarvebhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya

GE07bhg4c06u:956: dvividho hy ahaṅkāro viśeṣa-rūpaḥ sāmānya-rūpaś ceti |

GE07bhg4c06u:960: sa ca hiraṇyagarbho mahān ātmeti ca sarvānusyūtatvād ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:961: tābhyām ahaṅkārābhyāṃ vivikto nirupādhikaḥ śāntātmā sarvāntaś cid-eka-rasas tasmin mahāntam ātmānaṃ samaṣṭi-buddhiṃ niyacchet |

GE07bhg4c06u:964: śuddhe hi cid-eka-rase pratyag-ātmani jaḍa-śakti-rūpam anirvācyam avyaktaṃ prakṛtir upādhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:965: sā ca prathamaṃ sāmānyāhaṅkāra-rūpaṃ mahat tattvaṃ nāma dhṛtvā vyaktībhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:970: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:971: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ ||

GE07bhg4c06u:974: tatra gavādiṣv iva vāṅ-nirodhaḥ prathamā bhūmiḥ |

GE07bhg4c06u:980: tasya ca karma-kṣaye sati puruṣa-prayatnam antareṇa svata eva siddhatvāt tattva-darśanānupayogitvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:981: dṛśyate tvam agrayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ iti pūrvam abhidhāya sūkṣmatva-siddhaye nirodha-samādher abhidhānāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:982: sa ca tattva-didṛkṣor darśana-sādhanatvena dṛṣṭa-tattvasya ca jīvan-mukti-rūpa-kleśa-kṣayāyāpekṣitaḥ |

GE07bhg4c06u:991: utpanne tu tasmin mūṣāniṣikta-druta-tāmravad ghaṭa-duḥkhādi-rūpatvaṃ bhoga-hetu-dharmādharma-sahakṛta-sāmagrī-vaśād bhavati |

GE07bhg4c06u:995_0: nirupādhike pratīci saṃsthā samāptir yasya tad-ātma-saṃsthaṃ sarva-prakāra-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:995_1: svabhāva-siddhātmākāra-mātra-viśiṣṭaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā dhṛti-gṛhītayā viveka-buddhyā sampādyāsaṃprajñāta-samādhi-sthaḥ

GE07bhg4c06u:1013_1: yasmād yasmān nimittāc chabdāder viṣayād rāga-dveṣādeś ca cañcalaṃ vikṣepābhimukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1013_2: san mano niścarati vikṣiptaṃ sad viṣayābhimukhīṃ pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-smṛtīnām
GE07bhg4c06u:1014: tathā laya-hetūnāṃ nidrāśeṣa-bahv-aśana-śramādīnāṃ madhye yato yato nimittād asthiraṃ layābhimukhaṃ san mano niścarati līnaṃ sat samādhi-virodhinīṃ nidrākhyāṃ vṛttim utpādayati,

GE07bhg4c06u:1016: yathā na vikṣipyeta na vā līyeteti |

GE07bhg4c06u:1023: laye sambodhayec cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ śamayet punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1025: nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaḥ prajñayā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1027: yadā na līyate cittaṃ na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ |

GE07bhg4c06u:1029: upāyena vakṣyamāṇena vairāgyābhyāsena kāma-bhogayor vikṣiptaṃ pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-smṛtīnām anyatamayāpi vṛttyā pariṇataṃ mano nigṛhṇīyān nirundhyād ātmany evety arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c06u:1033: tatrāha - yathā kāmo viṣaya-gocara-pramāṇādi-vṛtty-utpādanena samādhi-virodhī tathā layo 'pi nidrākhya-vṛtty-utpādanena samādhi-virodhī |

GE07bhg4c06u:1039_1: gurūpadeśād anu paścāt paryālocya kāmāṃś cintyamānāvasthān viṣayān bhogān bhujyamānāvasthāṃś
GE07bhg4c06u:1041: kāmaś ca bhogaś ca kāma-bhogaṃ tasmān mano nivartayed iti vā |

GE07bhg4c06u:1047_1: layābhimukhaṃ bhavet tadā nidrā-śeṣājīrṇa-bahv-aśana-śramāṇāṃ laya-kāraṇānāṃ nirodhena
GE07bhg4c06u:1048: yadi punar evaṃ prabodhyamānaṃ dainandina-prabodhābhyāsa-vaśāt kāma-bhogayor vikṣiptaṃ syāt tadā vairāgya-bhāvanayā tattva-sākṣātkāreṇa ca punaḥ śamayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1049: evaṃ punaḥ punar abhyasyato layāt sambodhitaṃ viṣayebhyaś ca vyāvartitam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1051: sa-kaṣāyaṃ rāga-dveṣādi-prabala-vāsanā-vaśena stabdhībhāvākhyena kaṣāyeṇa doṣeṇa yuktaṃ vijānīyāt samāhitāc cittād vivekena jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1052: tataś ca nedaṃ samāhitam ity avagamya laya-vikṣepābhyām iva kaṣāyād api cittaṃ nirundhyāt |
