GE07bhg4c06u:1054: tac ca samaprāptaṃ cittaṃ kaṣāya-laya-bhrāntyā na cālayet, viṣayābhimukhaṃ na kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1055: kintu dhṛti-gṛhītayā buddhyā laya-kaṣāya-prāpter vivicya tasyām eva sama-prāptāv atiyatnena sthāpayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1057: etāvantaṃ kālam ahaṃ sukhīti sukhāsvāda-rūpāṃ vṛttiṃ na kuryāt samādhi-bhaṅga-prasaṅgāt iti prāg eva kṛta-vyākhyānam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1058: prajñayā yad upalabhyate sukhaṃ tad apy avidyā-parikalpitaṃ mṛṣaivety evaṃ-bhāvanayā niḥsaṅgo nispṛhaḥ sarva-sukheṣu bhavet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1059: athavā prajñayā sa-vikalpa-sukhākāra-vṛtti-rūpayā saha saṅgaṃ parityajet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1060: na tu svarūpa-sukham api nirvṛttikena cittena nānubhavet svabhāva-prāptasya tasya vārayitum aśakyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1061: evaṃ sarvato nivartya niścalaṃ prayatna-vaśena kṛtaṃ cittaṃ svabhāva-cāñcalyād viṣayābhimukhatayā niścarad bahir nirgacchad ekīkuryāt prayatnataḥ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1064: ity ucyate yadā na līyate nāpi stabdhībhavati tāmasatva-sāmyena laya-śabdenaiva stabdhībhāvasyopalakṣaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1065: na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ, na śabdādy-ākāra-vṛttim anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1066: nāpi sukham āsvādayati, rājasatva-sāmyena sukhāsvādasyāpi vikṣepa-śabdenopalakṣaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1068: evaṃ laya-kaṣāyābhyāṃ vikṣepa-sukhāsvādābhyāṃ ca rahitam aniṅganam iṅganaṃ calanaṃ sa-vāta-pradīpaval layābhimukhya-rūpaṃ tad-rahitaṃ nivāta-pradīpa-kalpam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1069: anābhāsaṃ na kenacid viṣayākāreṇābhāsata ity etat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1071: yadaivaṃ doṣa-catuṣṭaya-rahitaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā tac cittaṃ brahma niṣpannaṃ samaṃ brahma prāptaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1074: buddhiś ca na viceṣṭeta tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1075: tāṃ yogam iti manyante sthirām indriya-dhāraṇām |
GE07bhg4c06u:1076: apramattas tadā bhavati yogo hi prabhavāpyayau || [KaṭhU 2.3.11-2] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1077: etan-mūlakam eva ca yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti sūtram |
GE07bhg4c06u:1078: tasmād yuktaṃ tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany evaṃ vaśaṃ nayed iti ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1079: viśvanāthaḥ : yadi ca prāktana-doṣodgama-vaśād rajo-guṇa-spṛṣṭaṃ manaś cañcalaṃ syāt,
GE07bhg4c06u:1080: tadā punar yogam abhyased ity āha yato yata iti ||26||
GE07bhg4c06u:1082: yadi kadācit prāktana-sūkṣma-doṣān manaḥ pracalet tadā tat pratyāhared ity āha yata iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1083: yaṃ yaṃ viṣayaṃ prati mano nirgacchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1084: tatas tata etan mano niyamya pratyāhṛtyātmany eva niratiśaya-sukhatva-bhāvanayā vaśaṃ kuryāt ||26||
GE07bhg4c06u:1087: praśānta-manasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1090: evaṃ pratyāhārādibhiḥ punaḥ punar mano vaśīkurvan rajo-guṇa-kṣaye sati yoga-sukhaṃ prāpnotīty āha praśānteti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1091: evam ukta-prakāreṇa śāntaṃ rajo yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1092: ataeva praśāntaṃ mano yasya tam enaṃ niṣkalmaṣam brahmatvaṃ prāptaṃ yoginaṃ uttamam sukhaṃ samādhi-sukhaṃ svayam evopaiti prāpnoti ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1093: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yogābhyāsa-balād ātmany eva yoginaḥ praśāmyati manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1095: prakarṣeṇa śāntaṃ nirvṛttikatayā niruddhaṃ saṃskāra-mātra-śeṣaṃ mano yasya taṃ praśānta-manasaṃ vṛtti-śūnyatayā nirmanaskam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1096: nirmanaskatve hetu-garbhaṃ viśeṣaṇa-dvayaṃ śānta-rajasaṃ akalmaṣam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1097: śāntaṃ vikṣepakaṃ rajo yasya taṃ vikṣepa-śūnyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1098: tathā na vidyate kalmaṣam laya-hetus tamo yasya tam akalmaṣam laya-śūnyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1099: śānta-rajasam ity anenaiva tamo-guṇopalakṣaṇe ' kalmaṣam saṃsāra-hetu-dharmādharmādi-varjitam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1100: brahma-bhūtaṃ brahmaiva sarvam iti niścayena samaṃ brahma prāptaṃ jīvan-muktam enaṃ yoginam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1104: dyotayati hi-śabdaḥ | tathā ca prāg-vyākhyātaṃ sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad ity atra ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1105: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca pūrvavad eva tasya samādhisukhaṃ syād ity āha praśānteti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1107: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prayatamānasya pūrvavad eva samādhi-sukhaṃ syād ity āha praśānteti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1108: praśāntam ātmany acalaṃ mano yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1111: brahma-bhūtaṃ sākṣāt-kṛta-viviktāvirbhāvitāṣṭa-guṇakātma-svarūpaṃ yoginaṃ praty uttamam ātmānubhava-rūpaṃ mahat sukhaṃ kartā svayam evopaiti ||27||
GE07bhg4c06u:1116: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1117: evam anena prakāreṇa sarvadātmānaṃ mano yuñjan vaśīkurvan |
GE07bhg4c06u:1120: yogī sukhenānāyāsena brahmaṇaḥ saṃsparśo 'vidyā-nivartakaḥ sākṣātkāras tad evātyantaṃ sukham aśnute |
GE07bhg4c06u:1122: madhusūdanaḥ : uktaṃ sukhaṃ yoginaḥ sphuṭīkaroti yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1123_0: evam manasaivendriya-grāmam ity ādy-ukta-krameṇātmānaṃ manaḥ sadā yuñjan samādadhad
GE07bhg4c06u:1123_1: yogī yogena nitya-sambandhī vigata-kalmaṣo vigata-malaḥ saṃsāra-hetu-dharmādharma-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1123_3: viṣayāsparśena saha brahmaṇaḥ sparśas tādātmyaṃ yasmiṃs tad-viṣayāsaṃsparśi brahma-svarūpam ity etat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1124: atyantaṃ sarvānantān paricchedān atikrāntaṃ niratiśayaṃ sukham ānandam aśnute vyāpnoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:1128: sarva-vṛtti-śūnyena sūkṣmeṇa manasā sukhānubhavaḥ samādhāv evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1130: te cāntarāyā darśitā yoga-sūtreṇa - vyādhi-styāna-saṃśaya-pramādālasyāvirati-bhrānti-darśanālabdha-bhūmikatvānavasthitatvāni citta-vikṣepās te 'ntarāyāḥ [YogaS 1.30] |
GE07bhg4c06u:1131: cittaṃ vikṣipanti yogād apanayantīti citta-vikṣepā yoga-pratipakṣāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1133: vyādhy-ādayas tu sapta vṛtti-sahacaritatayā tat-pratipakṣā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1135: styānam akarmaṇyatā guruṇā śikṣyamāṇasyāpy āsanādi-karmānarhateti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1136: yogaḥ sādhanīyo na vety ubhaya-koṭi-spṛg-vijñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1137: sa cātad-rūpa-pratiṣṭhatvena viparyayāntargato 'pi sann ubhaya-koṭi-sparśitvaika-koṭi-sparśitva-rūpāvāntara-viśeṣa-vivakṣayātra viparyayād bhedenoktaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1138: | pramādaḥ samādhi-sādhanānām anuṣṭhāna-sāmarthye 'py ananuṣṭhāna-śīlatā viṣayāntara vyāpratatayā yoga-sādhaneṣv audāsīnyam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1139: ālasyaṃ satyām apy audāsīnya-pracyutau kaphādinā tamasā ca kāya-cittayor gurutvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1140: tac ca vyādhitvenāprasiddham api yoga-viṣaye pravṛtti-virodhi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1142: bhrānti-darśanaṃ yogāsādhane 'pi tat-sādhanatva-buddhis tathā tat-sādhane 'piy asādhanatva-buddhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1145: anavasthitatvaṃ labdhāyām api samādhi-bhūmau prayatna-śaithilyāc cittasya tatrāpratiṣṭhitatvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1146: ta ete citta-vikṣepā nava yogamalā yoga-pratipakṣā yogāntarāyā iti cābhidhīyante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1147: duḥkha-daurmanasyāṅgam ejayatva-śvāsa-praśvāsā vikṣepa-saha-bhuvaḥ [YogaS 1.31] duḥkhaṃ cittasya rājasaḥ pariṇāmo bādhanālakṣaṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1148: tac cādhyātmikaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca vyādhi-vaśāt kāmādi-vaśāc ca bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1150: daurmanasyam icchā-vighātādi-balavad duḥkhānubhava-janitaś cittasya tāmasaḥ pariṇāma-viśeṣaḥ kṣobhā-para-paryāyaḥ stabdhībhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1153: prāṇena bāhyasya vāyor antaḥ-praveśanaṃ śvāsaḥ samādhy-aṅga-recaka-virodhī |
GE07bhg4c06u:1154: prāṇana koṣṭhyasya vāyor bahir niḥsaraṇaṃ praśvāsaḥ samādhy-aṅga-pūraka-virodhī |
GE07bhg4c06u:1159_0: tīvra-saṃvegānām āsanne [YogaS 1.21] samādhi-lābhe prastuta īśvara-praṇidhānād vā
GE07bhg4c06u:1159_1: [YogaS 1.23] iti pakṣāntaram uktvā praṇidheyam īśvaraṃ kleśa-karma-vipākāśayair aparāmṛṣṭaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1161: sa pūrveṣām api guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt [YogaS 1.24-6] iti tribhiḥ sūtraiḥ pratipādya tat-praṇidhānaṃ dvābhyām asūtrayat -- tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1163_0: tataḥ pratyak-cetanādhigamo 'py antarāyābhāvaś ca [YogaS 1.29] tataḥ praṇava-japa-rūpāt
GE07bhg4c06u:1165: abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyām antarāya-nivṛttau kartavyāyām abhyāsa-dārḍhyārtham āha -- tat-pratiṣedhārtham eka-tattvābhyāsaḥ [YogaS 1.32] |
GE07bhg4c06u:1166: teṣām antarāyāṇāṃ pratiṣedhārtahm ekasmin kasmiṃścid abhimate tattve 'bhyāsaś cetasaḥ punaḥ punar niveśanaṃ kāryam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1173: sarva-prāṇiṣu sukha-sambhogāpanneṣu sādhv etan mama mitrāṇāṃ sukhitvam iti maitrīṃ bhāvayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1175: duḥkhiteṣu kathaṃ nu nāmaiṣā duḥkha-nivṛttiḥ syād iti kṛpām eva bhāvayet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1178: kuryān na tu vidveṣaṃ na copekṣām |
GE07bhg4c06u:1179: apuṇyavatsu caudāsīnyam eva bhāvayen nānumodanaṃ na vā dveṣam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1180: evam asya bhāvayataḥ śuklo dharma upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1181: tataś ca vigata-rāga-dveṣādi-malaṃ cittaṃ prasannaṃ sad ekāgratā-yogyaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1182: maitry-ādi-catuṣṭayaṃ copalakṣaṇam abhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādīnām amānitvam adambhitvam ity ādīnāṃ ca dharmāṇām,
GE07bhg4c06u:1184: rāga-dveṣau mahā-śatrū sarva-puruṣārtha-pratibandhakau mahatā prayatnena parihartavyāv ity etat-sūtrārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1185: evam anye 'pi prāṇāyāmādaya upāyāś citta-prasādanāya darśitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1186: tad etac citta-prasādanaṃ bhagavad-anugraheṇa yasya jātaṃ taṃ praty evaitad vacanam - sukheneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1188: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca kṛtārtha eva bhavatīty āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1189: sukham aśnute jīvan-mukta eva bhavatīty arthaḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c06u:1190: baladevaḥ : evaṃ svātma-sākṣātkārānantaraṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāraś ca labhata ity āha yuñjann iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1191_0: evam ukta-prakāreṇa ātmānaṃ svaṃ yuñjan yogenānubhavata tenaiva vigata-kalmaṣo dagdha-sarva-doṣo
GE07bhg4c06u:1191_1: yogī sukhenānāyāsena brahma-saṃsparśaṃ paramātmānubhavam atyantam aparimitaṃ sukham
GE07bhg4c06u:1196: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-sākṣātkāram eva darśayati sarva-bhūta-stham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1199: tathā sa svam ātmānam avidyākṛta-dehādi-pariccheda-śūnyaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu brahmādi-sthāvarānteṣv avasthitaṃ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1202_0: tad evaṃ nirodha-samādhinā tvaṃ-pada-lakṣye tat-pada-lakṣye ca śuddhe sākṣātkṛte
GE07bhg4c06u:1202_1: tadaikya-gocarā tattvam asīti vedānta-vākya-janyā nirvikalpaka-sākṣātkāra-rūpā vṛttir
GE07bhg4c06u:1203: tataś ca kṛtsnāvidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā brahma-sukham atyantam aśnuta ity upapādayati tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1205_0: sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgameṣu śarīreṣu bhoktṛtayā sthitam ekam eva vibhum ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1206_0: tasmiṃś cātmani sākṣiṇi sarvāṇi bhūtāni sākṣyāṇy ādhyāsikena sambandhena bhogyatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:1206_1: kalpitāni sākṣi-sākṣyayoḥ sambandhāntarānupapatter mithyā-bhūtāni paricchinnāni jaḍāni
GE07bhg4c06u:1208: yoga-yuktātmā yogena nirvikcāra-vaiśāradya-rūpeṇa yuktaṃ prasādaṃ prāpta ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1209_0: tathā ca prāg evoktaṃ - nirvicāra-vaiśāradye 'dhyātma-prasādaḥ [YogaS 1.47] ṛtaṃbharā
GE07bhg4c06u:1209_1: tatra prajñā [YogaS 1.48] śrutānumāna-prajñābhyām anya-viṣayā viśeṣārthatvāt [YogaS 1.49] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1210_1: yugapat sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ ca sarvaṃ tulyam eva paśyatīti sarvatra samaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1210_2: darśanaṃ yasyeti sarvatra sama-darśanaḥ sann ātmānam anātmānaṃ ca yoga-yuktātmā yathā-sthitam īkṣata iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1211: athavā yo yoga-yuktātmā yo vā sarvatra-sama-darśanaḥ sa ātmānam īkṣata iti yogi-sama-darśināv ātmekṣaṇādhikāriṇāv uktau |
GE07bhg4c06u:1212: yathā hi citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ sākṣi-sākṣātkāra-hetus tathā jaḍa-vivekena sarvānusyūta-caitanya-pṛthak-karaṇam api |
GE07bhg4c06u:1215: dvau kramau citta-nāśasya yogo jñānaṃ ca rāghava |
GE07bhg4c06u:1218: prakārau dvau tato devo jagāda paramaḥ śivaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1219: citta-nāśasya sākṣiṇaḥ sakāśāt tad-upādhi-bhūta-cittasya pṛthak-karaṇāt tad-adarśanasya |
GE07bhg4c06u:1221: samprajñāta-samādhau hi ātmaikākāra-vṛtti-pravāha-yuktam antaḥ-karaṇa-sattvaṃ sākṣiṇānubhūyate niruddha-sarva-vṛttikaṃ tūpaśāntatvān nānubhūyata iti viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1222: dvitīyas tu sākṣiṇi kalpitaṃ sākṣyam anṛtatvān nāsty eva sākṣy eva tu paramārtha-satyaḥ kevalo vidyata iti vicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1223: tatra pratamam upāyaṃ prapañca-paramārthatā-vādino hairaṇyagarbhādayaḥ prapedire |
GE07bhg4c06u:1225: śrīmac-chaṅkara-bhagavat-pūjya-pāda-matopajīvinas tv aupaniṣadāḥ prapañcānṛtatva-vādino dvitīyam evopāyam upeyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1227: kalpitasya bādhitasya cittasya tad-dṛśyasya cādarśanam anāyāsenaivopapadyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1228: ataeva bhagavat-pūjya-pādāḥ kutrāpi brahma-vidāṃ yogāpekṣāṃ na vyutpādayāṃ babhūva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1229: ataeva caupaniṣadāḥ paramahaṃsāḥ śraute vedānta-vākya-vicāra eva gurum upasṛtya pravartante brahma-sākṣātkārāya na tu yoge |
GE07bhg4c06u:1230: vicāreṇaiva citta-doṣa-nirākaraṇena tasyānyathā-siddhatvād iti kṛtam adhikena ||29||
GE07bhg4c06u:1231: viśvanāthaḥ : jīvan-muktasya tasya brahma-sākṣātkāraṃ darśayati sarva-bhūta-stham ātmānam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1232: paramātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtādhiṣṭhātṛtvam ātmanīti paramātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1237: evaṃ niṣpaṇṇa-samādhiḥ pratyakṣita-sva-parātma-yogī parātmanaḥ sarvagatatvaṃ tad anyātmanāṃ druhiṇādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ tad-āśrayatvaṃ tasyāviṣayamatvaṃ cānubhavatīty āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1238: yoga-yuktātmā siddha-samādhis tad ātmānaṃ ātatatvāc ca mātṛtvād ātmā hi paramo hariḥ iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1239: yo mām iti vivaraṇāc ca paramātmānaṃ sarva-bhūta-stham nikhilaṃ jīvāntaryāmiṇam īkṣate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1240: ātmani tasminn āśraya-bhūte sarva-bhūtāni ca tam eva sarva-jīvāśrayaṃ cekṣate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1242: tat tat-karmānuguṇyenoccāvacatayā sṛṣṭeṣu sarveṣu jīveṣu samam vaiṣamya-śūnyaṃ parātmānaṃ paśyatīti tathā ||29||
GE07bhg4c06u:1245: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1246: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1247: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtātma-jñāne ca sarva-bhūtātmayā mad-upāsanaṃ mukhyaṃ kāraṇam ity āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1248: māṃ parameśvaraṃ sarvatra bhūta-mātre yaḥ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1249: sarvaṃ ca prāṇi-mātraṃ mayi yaḥ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1250: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmy adṛśyo na bhavāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1252: pratyakṣo bhūtvā kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā taṃ vilokyānugṛhṇāmīty arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1253: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ śuddhaṃ tva-padārthaṃ nirūpya śuddhaṃ tat-padārthaṃ nirūpayati yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1254_0: yo yogī mām īśvaraṃ tat-padārtham aśeṣa-prapañca-kāraṇa-māyopādhikam upādhi-vivekena
GE07bhg4c06u:1254_1: sarvatra prapañce sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa cānusyūtaṃ sarvopādhi-vinirmuktaṃ paramārtha-satyaam
GE07bhg4c06u:1255: tathā sarvaṃ ca prapañca-jātaṃ māyayā mayy āropitaṃ mad-bhinnatayā mṛṣātvenaiva paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1257: īśvaraḥ kaścin mad-bhinno 'stīti parokṣa-jñāna-viṣayo na bhavāmi,
GE07bhg4c06u:1259: yadyappi vākyajāparokṣa-jñāna-viṣayatvaṃ tvaṃ-padārthābhedenaiva tathāpi kevalasyāpi tat-padārthasya yogajāparokṣa-jñāna-viṣayatvam
GE07bhg4c06u:1261: evaṃ yogajena pratyakṣeṇa mām aparokṣīkurvan sa ca me na praṇaśyati parokṣo na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1262: svātmā hi mama sa vidvān atipriyatvāt sarvadā mad-aparokṣa-jñāna-gocaro bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1263: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1265: avidvāṃs tu svātmānam api santaṃ bhagavantaṃ na parśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1266: ato bhagavān paśyann api taṃ na paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1267: sa enam avidito na bhunakti [BAU 1.4.15] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1268: vidvāṃs tu sadaiva saṃnihito bhagavato 'nugraha-bhājanam ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1269: viśvanāthaḥ : evam aparokṣānubhavinaḥ phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1271: tathā mat-pratyakṣatāyāṃ śāśvatikyāṃ satyāṃ sa yogī me mad-upāsako na praṇaśyati na kadācid api bhraśyati ||30||
GE07bhg4c06u:1272: baladevaḥ : etad vivṛṇvan tathātva-darśinaḥ phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1273: tasya tādṛśasya yogino 'haṃ paramātmā na praṇaśyāmi nādṛśyo bhavāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1274: sa ca yogī me na praṇaśyati nādṛśyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1278: sarva-bhūta-sthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1279: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate ||31||
GE07bhg4c06u:1280: śrīdharaḥ : na caivaṃ-bhūto vidhi-kiṅkaraḥ syād ity āha sarva-bhūta-sthitam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1281: sarva-bhūteṣu sthitaṃ mām abhedam āsthita āśrito yo bhajati sa yogī jñānī sarvathā karma-parityāgenāpi vartamāno mayy eva vartate mucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1284: evaṃ tvaṃ-padārthaṃ tat-padārthaṃ ca śuddhaṃ nirūpya tattvam asīti vākyārthaṃ nirūpayati sarva-bhūtam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1285_0: sarveṣu bhūteṣv adhiṣṭhānatayā sthitaṃ sarvānusyūta-san-mātraṃ mām īśvaraṃ tat-pada-lakṣyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1285_1: svena tvaṃ-pada-lakṣyeṇa sahaikatvam atyantābhedam āsthito ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa ity
GE07bhg4c06u:1285_2: atrevopādhi-bheda-nirākaraṇena niścinvan yo bhajati ahaṃ brahmāsmīti vedānta-vākyajena
GE07bhg4c06u:1285_3: sākṣātkāreṇāparokṣīkaroti so 'vidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā jīvanmuktaḥ kṛta-kṛtya eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1286: yāvat tu tasya bādhitānuvṛttyā śarīrādi-darśanam anuvartate tāvat prārabhda-karma-prābalyāt sarva-karma-tyāgena vā yājñavalkyādivat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1287: vihitena karmaṇā vā janakādivat, pratiṣiddhena karmaṇā vā dattātreyādivat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1288: sarvathā yena kenāpi rūpeṇa vartamāno 'pi vyavaharann aḸ sa yogī
GE07bhg4c06u:1289: brahmāham asamīti vidvān mayi paramātmany evābhedena vartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1290: sarvathā tasya mokṣaṃ prati nāsti pratibandha-śaṅkā tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśata ātmā hy eṣāṃ sa bhavati [BAU 1.4.10] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1291: devā mahā-prabhāvā api tasya mokṣābhavanāya neśate kim utānye kṣudrā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1292_0: brahma-vido niṣiddha-karmaṇi pravartakayo rāga-dveṣayor asambhavena niṣiddha-karmāsambhave
GE07bhg4c06u:1292_1: 'pi tad aṅgīkṛtya jñāna-stuty-artham idam uktaṃ sarvathā vartamāno 'pīti hatvāpi
GE07bhg4c06u:1292_2: sa imān lokān na hanti na nibadhyate [Gītā 18.17] itivat ||31 ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1294: evaṃ mad-aparokṣānubhavāt pūrva-daśāyām api sarvatra parātma-bhāvanayā bhajato yogino na vidhi-kaiṅkaryam ity āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1295: paramātmaiva sarva-karaṇatvād eko 'stīty ekatvam āsthitaḥ san yo bhajati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1297: sa sarvathā śāstroktaṃ karma kurvann akurvan vā vartamāno mayi vartate,
GE07bhg4c06u:1299: baladevaḥ : sa yogī mamācintya-svarūpa-śaktim anubhavann atipriyo bhavatīty āśayavān āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1300: sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ hṛdayeṣu prādeśa-mātraś caturbāhur atasī-puṣpa-prabhaś cakrādidharo 'haṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅ nivasāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1301: teṣu bahūnāṃ mad-vigrahāṇām ekatvam abhedam āśrito yo māṃ bhajati dhyāyati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1302_0: so yogī sarvathā vartamāno vyutthāna-kāle sva-vihitaṃ karma kurvann akurvan vā mayi
GE07bhg4c06u:1304: śrutiś ca harer acintya-śatkikatām āha eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti iti | smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c06u:1305: eka eva paro viṣṇuḥ sarva-vyāpī na saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1306: aiśvaryād rūpam ekaṃ ca sūryavad bahudheyate || iti ||31||
GE07bhg4c06u:1310: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c06u:1311: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ ca māṃ bhajatāṃ yogināṃ madhye sarva-bhūtānukampī śreṣṭha ity āha ātmaupamyeneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1313: yathā mama sukhaṃ priyaṃ duḥkhaṃ cāpriyaṃ tathānyeṣāṃ apīti sarvatra samaṃ paśyan sukham eva sarveṣāṃ yo vāñchati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1315: sa yogī śreṣṭho mamābhimata ity arthaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c06u:1317_0: evam utpanne 'pi tatva-bodhe kaścin mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayayor abhāvāj jīvanmukti-sukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1317_1: nānubhavati citta-vikṣepeṇa ca dṛṣṭa-duḥkham anubhavati so 'paramo yogī deha-pāte
GE07bhg4c06u:1319: tattva-jñāna-mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayāṇāṃ tu yugapad abhyāsād dṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nivṛtti-pūrvakaṃ jīvanmukti-sukham anubhavan prārabdha-karma-vaśāt samādher vyutthāna-kāle kiṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c06u:1321_0: ātmaivaupamyam upamā tenātma-dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra prāṇi-jāte sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1321_1: samaṃ tulyaṃ yaḥ paśyati svasyāniṣṭaṃ yathā na sampādayati evaṃ parasyāpy aniṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1322: sa nirvāsanatayopaśānta-manā yogī brahmavit paramaḥ śreṣṭho mataḥ pūrvasmāt, he arjuna |
GE07bhg4c06u:1323: atas tattva-jñāna-mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayāṇām akramam abhyāsāya mahān prayatna āstheya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1324_0: tatredaṃ sarvaṃ dvaita-jātam advitīye cid-ānandātmani māyayā kalpitatvān mṛṣaivātmaivaikaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1324_1: paramārtha-satyaḥ sac-cid-ānandādvayo 'ham asmīti jñānaṃ tattva-jñānaṃ pradīpa-jvālā-santānavad
GE07bhg4c06u:1324_2: vṛtti-santāna-rūpeṇa pariṇamamānam antaḥ-karaṇa-dravyaṃ mananātmakatvān mana ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1325: tasya nāśe nāma vṛtti-rūpa-pariṇāmaṃ parityajya sarva-vṛtti-nirodhinā nirodhākāreṇa pariṇāmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1326: pūrvāpara-parāmarśam antareṇa sahasotpadyamānasya krodhādi-vṛtti-viśeṣasya hetuś citta-gataḥ saṃskāra-viśeṣo vāsanā pūrva-pūrvābhyāsena citte vāsyamānatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1327: tasyāḥ kṣayo nāma viveka-janyāyāṃ citta-praśama-vāsanāyāṃ dṛḍhāyāṃ saty api bāhye nimitte krodhādy-anutpattiḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1328: tatra tattva-jñāne sati mithyā-bhūte jagati nara-viṣāṇādāv iva dhī-vṛtty-anudayād ātmanaś
GE07bhg4c06u:1329: ca dṛṣṭatvena punar-vṛtty-anupayogān nirandhanāgnivan mano naśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1330: naṣṭe ca manasi saṃskārodbodhakasya bāhyasya nimittasyāpratītau vāsanā kṣīyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1331: kṣīṇāyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ hetv-abhāvena krodhādi-vṛtty-anudayān mano naśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1332: naṣṭe ca manasi śama-damādi-sampattyā tattva-jñānam udeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1333: evam utpanne tattva-jñāne rāga-dveṣādi-rūpā vāsanā kṣīyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1334: kṣīṇāyāṃ ca vāsanāyāṃ pratibandhābhāvāt tattva-jñānodaya iti paraspara-kāraṇatvaṃ darśanīyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1337: mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatvā duḥsādhyāni sthitāni hi ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1339: bhogecchāṃ dūratas tyaktvā trayam etat samāśraya || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1340: pauruṣo yatnaḥ kenāpy upāyenāvaśyaṃ sampādayiṣyāmīty evaṃ-vidhotsāha-rūpo nirbandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1342: tattva-jñānasya śravaṇādikaṃ sādhanaṃ mano-nāśasya yogaḥ vāsanā-kṣayasya pratikūla-vāsanotpādanam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1343: etādṛśa-viveka-yuktena pauruṣeṇa prayatnena bhogecchāyāḥ svalpāyā api haviṣā kṛṣṇa-vartmeveti nyāyena vāsanā-vṛddhi-hetutvād dūrata ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1344: dvividho hi vidyādhikārī kṛtopāstir akṛtopāstiś ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1345: tatra ya upāsya-sākṣātkāra-paryantām upāstiṃ kṛtvā tattva-jñānāya pravṛttas tasya vāsanā-kṣaya-mano-nāśaayor dṛḍhataratvena jñānād ūrdhvaṃ jīvan-muktiḥ svata eva sidhyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1346: idānīṃtanas tu prāyeṇākṛtopāstir eva mumukṣur autsukya-mātrāt sahasā vidyāyāṃ pravartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1347: yogaṃ vinā cij-jaḍa-viveka-mātreṇaiva ca mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayau tātkālikau sampādya śama-damādi-sampattyā śravana-manana-nididhyāsanāni sampādayati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1348: taiś ca dṛḍhābhyastaiḥ sarva-bandha-vicchedi tattva-jñānam udeti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1349: avidyā-granthi-brahmatvaṃ hṛdaya-granthiḥ saṃśayāḥ karmāṇy asarva-kāmatvaṃ mṛtyuḥ punar janma cety aneka-vidho bandho jñānān nivartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1350: tathā ca śrūyate - yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ so 'vidyā-granthiṃ vikiratīha somya
GE07bhg4c06u:1353: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare || [MuṇḍU 2.2.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1355: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman |
GE07bhg4c06u:1356: so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha [TaittU 1.1] tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1357: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati sa-manaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1358: sa tu tat-padam āpnoti yasmād bhūyo na jāyate || [KaṭhU 1.3.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1359: ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati [BAU 1.4.10] ity asarvatva-nivṛtti-phalam udāhāryam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1360: seyaṃ videha-muktiḥ saty api dehe jñānotpatti-sama-kālīnā jñeyā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1361: brahmaṇy avidyādhyāropitānām eteṣāṃ bandhānām avidyā-nāśe sati nivṛttau punar utpatty-asambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1363: mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayautu dṛḍhābhyāsābhāvād bhoga-pradena prārabdhena karmaṇā bādhyamānatvāc ca savāta-pradeśa-pradīpavat sahasā nivartete |
GE07bhg4c06u:1364: ata idānīṃtanasya tattva-jñāninaḥ prāk-siddhe tattva-jñāne na prayatnāpekṣā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1370: yad ādānaṃ padārthasya vāsanā sā prakīrtitā ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1372: sā ca vāsanā dvividhā malinā śuddhā ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1375: malinā tu trividhā loka-vāsanā śāstra-vāsanā deha-vāsanā ceti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1376: sarve janā yathā na nindanti tathaivācariṣyāmīty aśakyārthābhiniveśo loka-vāsanā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1377: tasyāś ca ko lokam ārādhayituṃ samartha iti nyāyena sampādayitum aśakyatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvāc ca malinatvam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1378: śāstra-vāsanā tu trividhā pāṭha-vyasanaṃ bahu-śāstra-vyasanam anuṣṭhāna-vyasanaṃ ceti krameṇa bharadvājasya durvāsaso nidāghasya ca prasiddhā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1379: malinatvaṃ cāsyāḥ kleśāvahatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvād darpa-hetutvāj janma-hetutvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1385: doṣāpanayanam api dvividhaṃ laukikaṃ śāstrīyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1388: etasyāś ca sarva-prakārāyā malinatvam aprāmāṇikatvād aśakyatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvāt punar-janma-hetutvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1389: tad etal-loka-śāstra-deha-vāsanā-trayam avivekanām upādeyatvena pratibhāsamānam api vividiṣor vedanotpatti-virodhitvād viduṣo jñāna-niṣṭhā-virodhitvāc ca vivekibhir heyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1391: ābhyantara-vāsanā tu kāma-krodha-dambha-darpādy-āsura-sampad-rūpā sarvānartha-mūlaṃ mānasī vāsanety ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1392: tad evaṃ bāhyābhyantara-vāsanā-catuṣṭayasya śuddha-vāsanayā kṣayaḥ sampādanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1396: tatra viṣaya-vāsanā-śabdena pūrvoktās tisro loka-śāstra-veda-vāsanā vivakṣitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1401: asmin pakṣe pūrvoktānāṃ catasṛṇām anayor evāntarbhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1404: tāś ca maitry-ādi-vāsanā bhagavatā patañjalinā sūtritāḥ prāk saṃkṣepeṇa vyākhyātā api punar vyākhyāyante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1407: mohād anubhūyamānaṃ sukham anuśete kaścid dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣo rājasaḥ sarvaṃ sukha-jātīyaṃ me bhūyād iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1410: yadā tu sukhiu prāṇiṣv ayaṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayet sarve 'py ete sukhino madīyā iti tadā tat sukhaṃ svakīyam eva sampannam iti bhāvayatas tatra rāgo nivartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1411: yathā svasya rājya-nivṛttāv api putrādi-rājyam eva svakīyaṃ rājyaṃ tadvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1412: nivṛtte ca rāge varṣāvyapāye jalam iva cittaṃ prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1413: tathā duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ [YogaS 2.8] duḥkham anuśete kaścd dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣas tamo 'nugata-rajaḥ-pariṇāma īdṛśaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvadā me mā bhūd iti | tac ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1415: na ca sarve te duḥkha-hetavo hantuṃ śakyante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1416: ataḥ sa dveṣaḥ sadā hṛdayaṃ dahati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1417: yadā tu svasyeva pareṣāṃ sarveṣām api duḥkham mā bhūd iti karuṇāṃ duḥkhiṣu bhāvayet tadā vairyādi-dveṣa-nivṛttau cittaṃ prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1419: prāṇā yathātmano 'bhīṣṭā bhūtānām api te tathā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1420: ātmaupamyena bhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1421: etad evehāpy uktam - ātmaupamyena sarvatrety ādi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1422: tathā prāṇinaḥ svabhāvata eva puṇyaṃ nānutiṣṭhanti pāpaṃ tv anutiṣṭhanti | tad āhuḥ -
GE07bhg4c06u:1423: puṇyasya phalam icchanti puṇyaṃ necchanti mānavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1424: na pāpa-phalam icchanti pāpaṃ kurvanti yatnataḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1425: te ca puṇya-pāpe akriyamāṇa-kriyamāṇe paścāt-tāpaṃ janayataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1426: sa ca śrutyānūditaḥ - kim ahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kim ahaṃ pāpam akaravam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1427: yady asau puṇya-puruṣeṣu muditāṃ bhāvayet tadā tad-vāsanāvān svayam evāpramatto 'śukla-kṛṣṇe puṇye pravartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1428: tad uktaṃ karmāśukla-kṛṣṇaṃ yoginas trividham itareṣām ayogināṃ trividhaṃ śuklaṃ śubhaṃ kṛṣṇam aśubhaṃ śukla-kṛṣṇaṃ śubhāśubham iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1429: tathā pāpa-puruṣeṣūpekṣāṃ bhāvayan svayam api tad-vāsanāvān pāpān nivartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1430: tataś ca puṇyākaraṇa-pāpa-karaṇa-nimittasya paścāt-tāpasyābhāve cittaṃ prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1431: evaṃ sukhiṣu maitrīṃ bhāvayato na kevalaṃ rāgo nivartate kiṃtv asūyerṣyādayo 'pi nivartante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1434: yadā maitrī-vaśāt para-sukhaṃ svīyam eva sampannaṃ tadā para-guṇeṣu katham asūyādikaṃ sambhavet |
GE07bhg4c06u:1435: tathā duḥkhiṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayataḥ śatru-vadhādikaro dveṣo yadā nivartate tadā duḥkhitva-pratiyogika-svasukhitva-prayukta-darpo 'pi nivartate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1437: tad evaṃ tattva-jñānaṃ mano-nāśo vāsanā-kṣayaś ceti trayam abhyasanīyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1438: tatra kenāpi dvāreṇa punaḥ punas tattvānusmaraṇaṃ tattva-jñānābhyāsaḥ | tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c06u:1440: etad eka-paratvaṃ ca brahmābhyāsaṃ vidur budhāḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1441: sargādāv eva notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva tat sadā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1442: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti bodhābhyāsaṃ viduḥ param || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1445: yuktyā śāstrair yatante ye te 'py atrābhyāsinaḥ sthitāḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1447: svarūpeṇāpy apratītir atyantābhāva-sampattis tad-artham | yuktyā yogena |
GE07bhg4c06u:1449: ratir ghanoditā yāsau brahmābhyāsaḥ sa ucyate ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1451_0: tasmād upapannam etat tattva-jñānābhyāsena mano-nāśābhyāsena vāsanā-kṣayābhyāsena
GE07bhg4c06u:1451_1: ca rāga-dveṣa-śūnyatayā yaḥ sva-para-sukha-duḥkhādiṣu sama-dṛṣṭiḥ sa paramo yogī
GE07bhg4c06u:1451_2: mato yas tu viṣama-dṛṣṭiḥ sa tattva-jñānavān apy aparamo yogīti ||32 ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1452: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca, sādhana-daśāyāṃ yogī sarvatra samaḥ syād ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1454: sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ veti yathā mama sukhaṃ priyaṃ duḥkham apriyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1455: tathaivānyeṣām apīti sarvatra samaṃ paśyan sukham eva sarveṣāṃ yo vāñchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1458: baladevaḥ : sarva-bhūta-hite rataḥ iti yat prāg uktaṃ, tad viśadayati ātmaupamyeneti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1459: vyutthāna-daśāyām ātmaupamyena sva-sādṛśyena sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca yaḥ sarvatra samaṃ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1462: sa sva-para-sukha-duḥkha-sama-dṛṣṭiḥ sarvānukampī yogī mama paramaḥ śreṣṭho 'bhimataḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1467: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana |
GE07bhg4c06u:1468: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām ||33||
GE07bhg4c06u:1469: śrīdharaḥ : ukta-lakṣaṇasya yogasyāsambhavaṃ manvāno 'rjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1472: etasya sthirāṃ dīrgha-kālāṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1474: madhusūdanaḥ : uktam artham ākṣipan arjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1475: yo 'yaṃ sarvatra samaṣṭi-lakṣaṇaḥ paramo yogaḥ sāmyena samatvena citta-gatānāṃ rāga-dveṣādīnāṃ viṣama-dṛṣṭi-hetūnāṃ nirākaraṇena tvayā sarvajñeneśvareṇoktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1476_0: he madhusūdana ! sarva-vaidika-sampradāya-pravartaka ! etasya tvad-uktasya sarva-mano-vṛtti-nirodha-lakṣaṇasya
GE07bhg4c06u:1476_1: yogasya sthitiṃ vidyamānatāṃ sthirāṃ dīrgha-kālānuvartinīṃ na paśyāmi na sambhāvayāmi
GE07bhg4c06u:1477: kasmān na sambhāvayasi tatrāha cañcalatvāt, manasa iti śeṣaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c06u:1478: viśvanāthaḥ : bhagavad-ukta-lakṣaṇasya sāmyasya duṣkaratvam ālakṣyovāca yo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1479: etasya sāmyena prāptasya yogasya sthirāṃ sārvadikīṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c06u:1480: eṣa yogaḥ sarvadā na tiṣṭhati kintu tri-catura-dināny evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1482: tathā hy ātma-duḥkha-sukha-samam eva sarva-jagad-varti-janānāṃ sukha-duḥkhaṃ paśyed iti sāmyam uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1483: tatra ye bandhavas taṭasthāś ca teṣu sāmyaṃ bhaved api,
GE07bhg4c06u:1484: ye ripavo ghātakā dveṣṭāro nindakāś ca teṣu na sambhaved eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1485: na hi mayā svasya yudhiṣṭhirasya duryodhanasya ca sukha-duḥkhe sarvathā tulye draṣṭuṃ śakyete |
GE07bhg4c06u:1486: yadi ca svasya sva-ripūṇāṃ ca jīvātma-paramātma-prāṇendriya-daihika-bhūtāni samāny eveti vivekena prabalasyāticañcalasya manaso nigrahaṇāśakyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1487: pratyuta viṣayāsaktena tena manasaiva vivekasya grasyamānatva-darśanād
GE07bhg4c06u:1489: baladevaḥ : uktam ākṣipann arjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1490: sāmyena sva-para-sukha-duḥkha-taulyena yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā sarvajñena proktas tasya sthirāṃ sārvadikīṃ sthitiṃ niṣṭhām apy ahaṃ na paśyāmi,
GE07bhg4c06u:1493: ayam arthaḥ - bandhuṣu udāsīneṣu ca tat sāmyaṃ kadācit syāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1494: na ca śatruṣu nindakeṣu ca kadācid api |
GE07bhg4c06u:1495: yadi paramātmādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ sarvatrāviśeṣam iti vivekena tad grāhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1496: tarhi na tat sārvadikaṃ aticapalasya baliṣṭhasya ca manasas tena vivekena nigrahītum aśakyatvād iti ||33||
GE07bhg4c06u:1499: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham |
GE07bhg4c06u:1500: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram ||34||
GE07bhg4c06u:1505: kiṃ ca balavad vicāreṇāpi jetum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1507: ato yathākāśe dodhūyamānasya vāyoḥ kumbhādiṣu nirodhanam aśakyaṃ tathāhaṃ tasya manaso nigrahaṃ nirodhaṃ suduṣkaraṃ sarvathā kartum aśakyaṃ manye ||34||
GE07bhg4c06u:1508: madhusūdanaḥ : sarva-loka-prasiddhatvena tad eva cañcalatvam upapādayati cañcalaṃ hīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1509: cañcalam atyarthaṃ calaṃ sadā calana-svabhāvaṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1511: bhaktānāṃ pāpādi-doṣān sarvathā nivārayitum aśakyān api kṛṣati nivārayati teṣām eva sarvathā prāptum aśayān api puruṣārthān ākarṣati prāpayatīti vā kṛṣṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1512: tena rūpeṇa sambodhayan durnivāram api citta-cāñcalyaṃ nivārya duṣprāpam api samādhi-sukhaṃ tvam eva prāpayituṃ śaknoṣīti sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1513: na kevalam atyarthaṃ cañcalaṃ kintu pramāthi śarīram indriyāṇi ca pramathituṃ kṣobhayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1515: kiṃ ca balavat, abhipretād viṣayāt kenāpy upāyena nivārayitum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1517: bhettum aśakyam, tantu-nāga-vad acchedyam iti bhāṣye |
GE07bhg4c06u:1519: tāntanīti gurjarādau prasiddho mahā-hrada-nivāsī jantu-viśeṣo vā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1520_0: tasyātidṛḍhatayā balavato balavattayā pramāthinaḥ pramāthitayāticañcalasya mahā-matta-vana-gajasya
GE07bhg4c06u:1520_1: nigrahaṃ nirodhaṃ nirvṛttikatayāvasthānaṃ suduṣkaraṃ sarvathā kartum aśakyam ahaṃ manye |
GE07bhg4c06u:1522: yathākāśe dodhūyamānasya vāyor niścalatvaṃ sampādya nirodhanam aśakyaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1525: citta-vṛtti-nirodha-rūpeṇa tu yogena tasya nivāraṇaṃ jīvanmuktir ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1526: yasyāḥ sampādanena sa yogī paramo mata ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1528: bandhaḥ kiṃ sākṣiṇo nivāryate kiṃ vā cittāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1532_0: na hi jalād ārdratvam agner voṣṇatvaṃ nivārayituṃ śakyate pratikṣaṇa-pariṇamino hi
GE07bhg4c06u:1532_1: bhāvā ṛte citi-śakteḥ iti nyāyena pratikṣaṇa-pariṇama-svabhāvatvāc cittasya prārabdha-bhogena
GE07bhg4c06u:1532_2: ca karmaṇā kṛtsnāvidyā-tat-kārya-nāśane pravṛttasya tattva-jñānasyāpi pratibandhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1534: na ca karmaṇā sva-phala-sukha-duḥkhādi-bhogaś citta-vṛttibhir vinā sampādayituṃ śakyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1535_0: tasmād yadyapi svābhāvikānām api citta-pariṇāmānāṃ kathaṃcid yogenābhibhavaḥ śakyeta
GE07bhg4c06u:1535_1: kartuṃ tathāpi tattva-jñānād iva yogād api prārabdha-phalasya karmaṇaḥ prābalyād
GE07bhg4c06u:1535_2: avaśyambhāvini cittasya cāñcalye yogena tan-nivāraṇam aśakyam ahaṃ sva-bodhād eva manye |
GE07bhg4c06u:1536: tasmād anupapannam etad ātmaupamyena sarvatra sama-darśī paramo yogī mata ity arjunasyākṣepaḥ |34||
GE07bhg4c06u:1538: nanu ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ ratham eva ca [KaṭhU 1.3.3] ity ādi śruteḥ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1541: vartmāni mātrā dhiṣaṇaṃ ca sūtam [BhP 7.15.41] iti smṛteś ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1542: buddher mano niyantṛtva-darśanād vivekavatyā buddhyā mano vaśīkartuṃ śaktyam eveti ced ata āha balavat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1543: sva-praśamakam auṣudham api balavān rogo yathā na gaṇayati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1544: tathaiva svabhāvād eva baliṣṭhaṃ mano vivekavatīm api buddhim |
GE07bhg4c06u:1545: kiṃ ca dṛḍham atisūkṣma-buddhi-sūcyāpi loham iva sahasā bhettum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1546: vāyor ity ākāśe dodhūyamānasya vāyor nigrahaṃ kumbhakādinā nirodham iva yogenāṣṭāṅgena manaso 'pi nirodhaṃ duṣkaraṃ manye ||34||
GE07bhg4c06u:1547: baladevaḥ : tad evāha cañcalaṃ hīti | manaḥ svabhāvena cañcalam | nanu
GE07bhg4c06u:1548: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ ratham eva ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1549: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragraham eva ca ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1550: indriyāṇi hayān āhur viṣayāṃs teṣu gocarān |
GE07bhg4c06u:1552: iti śruter buddhi-niyamyaṃ manaḥ śrūyate tato vivekinyāṃ buddhyāṃ śakyaṃ tad vaśīkartum iti cet tatrāha pramāthīti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1554: kutaḥ ? balavat sva-praśamakam apy auṣadhaṃ yathā balavān rogo na gaṇayati, tadvat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1555: kiṃ ca dṛḍham sūcyā lauham iva tādṛśyāpi buddhyā bhettum aśakyam ato yogenāpi tasya nigraham ahaṃ vāyor iva suduṣkaraṃ manye |
GE07bhg4c06u:1556: na hi vāyor muṣṭinā dhartuṃ śakyate atas tatropāyaṃ brūhīti ||34||
GE07bhg4c06u:1561: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate ||35||
GE07bhg4c06u:1563: tad uktaṃ cañcalatvādikam aṅgīkṛtyaiva mano-nigrahopāyaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca asaṃśayam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1564: cañcalatvādinā mano niroddhum aśakyam iti yad vadasi etan niḥsaṃśayam eva |
GE07bhg4c06u:1565: tathāpi tv abhyāsena paramātmākāra-pratyayā vṛttyā viṣaya-vaitṛṣṇyena ca gṛhyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1566: abhyāsena laya-pratibandhād vairāgyeṇa ca vikṣepa-pratibandhād uparata-vṛttikaṃ sat paramātmākāreṇa tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1570: madhusūdanaḥ : tam imam ākṣepaṃ pariharan śrī-bhagavān uvāca asaṃśayam iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1571_0: samyag viditaṃ te citta-ceṣṭitaṃ mano nigrahītuṃ śakṣyasīti santoṣeṇa sambodhayati
GE07bhg4c06u:1571_1: he mahābāho mahāntau sākṣān mahādevenāpi saha kṛta-praharaṇau bāhū yasyeti niratiśayam utkarṣaṃ sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1572: prārabdha-karma-prābalyād asaṃyatātmanā durnigrahaṃ duḥkhenāpi nigrahītum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1573: pramāthi balavad dṛḍham iti viśeṣaṇa-trayaṃ piṇḍīkṛtyaitad uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1574: calaṃ svabhāva-cañcalaṃ mana ity asaṃśayaṃ nāsty eva saṃśayo 'tra satyam evaitad bravīṣīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1575: evaṃ saty api saṃyatātmanā samādhi-mātropāyena yoginābhyāsena vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate nigṛhyate sarva-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ kriyate tan mana ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1576: anigrahītur asaṃyatātmanaḥ sakāśāt saṃyatātmano nigrahītur viśeṣa-dyotanāya
GE07bhg4c06u:1579: he kaunteyeti pitṛ-ṣvasṛ-putras tvam avaśyaṃ mayā sukhī kartavya iti sneha-sambandha-sūcanenāśvāsayati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1580: atra prathamārdhena cittasya haṭha-nigraho na sambhavatīti dvitīyārdhena tu krama-nigrahaḥ sambhavatīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1583: tatra cakṣuḥ-śrotrādīni jñānendriyāṇi vāk-pāṇy-ādīni karmendriyāṇi ca tad-golaka-mātroparodhena haṭhān nigṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c06u:1584: tad-dṛṣṭāntena mano 'pi haṭhena nigrahīṣyāmīti mūḍhasya bhrāntir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1585: na ca tathā nigrahītuṃ śakyate tad-golakasya hṛdaya-kamalasya niroddhum aśakyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c06u:1586: ataeva ca krama-nigraha eva yuktas tad etad bhagavān vasiṣṭha āha -
GE07bhg4c06u:1588: na śakyate mano jetuṃ vinā yuktim aninditām ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1592: etās tā yuktayaḥ puṣṭāḥ santi citta-jaye kila ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1593: satīṣu yuktiṣv etāsu haṭhān niyamayanti ye |
GE07bhg4c06u:1594: cetas te dīpam utsṛjya vinighnanti tamo 'ñjanaiḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1596: sā hi dṛśyasya mithyātvaṃ dṛg-vastunaś ca paramārtha-satya-paramānanda-svaprakāśatavaṃ bodhayati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1597: tathā ca saty etan manaḥ sva-gocareṣu buddhvā nirindhanāgnivat svayam evopaśāmyati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1598: yas tu bodhitam api tattvaṃ na samyag budhyate yo vā vismarati tayoḥ sādhu-saṅgama evopāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1599: sādhavo hi punaḥ punar bodhayanti smārayanti ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1600: yas tu vidyā-madādi-durvāsanayā pīḍyamāno na sādhūn anuvartitum utsahate tasya pūrvokta-vivekena vāsanā-parityāga evopāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1601: yas tu vāsanānām atiprābalyāt tās tyaktuṃ na śaknoti tasya prāṇa-spanda-nirodha eva upāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1602: prāṇa-spanda-vāsanayoś citta-prerakatvāt tayor nirodhe citta-śāntir upapadyate |
GE07bhg4c06u:1605: ekasmiṃś ca tayoḥ kṣīṇe kṣipraṃ dve api naśyataḥ ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1612: etāvan mātrakaṃ manye rūpaṃ cittasya rāghava |
GE07bhg4c06u:1614: yadā na bhāvyate kiṃcid dheyopādeya-rūpi yat |
GE07bhg4c06u:1615: sthīyate sakalaṃ tyaktvā tadā cittaṃ na jāyate ||
GE07bhg4c06u:1616: avāsanatvāt satataṃ yadā na manute manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1618: atra dvāv evopāyau paryavasitau prāṇa-spanda-nirodhārtham abhyāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c06u:1621: ata eva bhagavatābhyāsena vairāgyeṇa ceti dvayam evoktam |
GE07bhg4c06u:1622: ataeva bhagavān patañjalir asūtrayat abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ tan-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.12] iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1623_1: āsuratvena kliṣṭānāṃ daivatvenākliṣṭānām api vṛttīnāṃ sarvāssām api nirodho nirindhanāgnivad
GE07bhg4c06u:1623_2: upaśamākhyaḥ pariṇāmo 'bhyāsena vairāgyeṇa ca samuccitena bhavati |
GE07bhg4c06u:1624: tad uktaṃ yoga-bhāṣye - citta-nadī nāmobhayato-vāhinī vahati kalyāṇāya vahati pāpāya ca |
GE07bhg4c06u:1625: tatra yā kaivalya-prāg-bhārā viveka-nimnā sā kalyāṇa-vahā
GE07bhg4c06u:1626: | yā tv aviveka-nimnā saṃsāra-prāg-bhārā sā pāpa-vahā |
GE07bhg4c06u:1628: viveka-darśanābhyāsena ca kalyāṇa-srota udghāṭyate ity ubhayādhīnaś citta-vṛtti-nirodha iti |
GE07bhg4c06u:1629: prāg-bhāra-nimna-pade tadā viveka-nimnaṃ kaivalya-prāg-bhāraṃ cittam ity atra vyākhyāyate |
